ËøôÈáåÊàë‰ª¨Âè™ÈíàÂØπRecyclerViewÔºåËÅäËÅä‰∏áËÉΩÈÄÇÈÖçÂô®Âá∫Áé∞ÁöÑÂéüÂõ†„ÄÇ‰∏∫‰∫ÜÂàõÂª∫‰∏Ä‰∏™RecyclerViewÁöÑAdapterÔºåÊØèÊ¨°Êàë‰ª¨ÈÉΩÈúÄË¶ÅÂéªÂÅöÈáçÂ§çÂä≥Âä®ÔºåÂåÖÊã¨ÈáçÂÜôonCreateViewHolder(),getItemCount()„ÄÅÂàõÂª∫ViewHolderÔºåÂπ∂‰∏îÂÆûÁé∞ËøáÁ®ãÂ§ßÂêåÂ∞èÂºÇÔºåÂõ†Ê≠§‰∏áËÉΩÈÄÇÈÖçÂô®Âá∫Áé∞‰∫Ü„ÄÇ ‰∏áËÉΩÈÄÇÈÖçÂô®ËøôÈáåËÆ≤Ëß£‰∏ã‰∏áËÉΩÈÄÇÈÖçÂô®ÁöÑÂÆûÁé∞ÊÄùË∑Ø„ÄÇ Êàë‰ª¨ÈÄöËøápublic abstract class QuickAdapter<T> extends RecyclerView.Adapter<QuickAdapter.VH>ÂÆö‰πâ‰∏áËÉΩÈÄÇÈÖçÂô®QuickAdapterÁ±ªÔºåTÊòØÂàóË°®Êï∞ÊçÆ‰∏≠ÊØè‰∏™ÂÖÉÁ¥†ÁöÑÁ±ªÂûãÔºåQuickAdapter.VHÊòØQuickAdapterÁöÑViewHolderÂÆûÁé∞Á±ªÔºåÁß∞‰∏∫‰∏áËÉΩViewHolder„ÄÇ È¶ñÂÖà‰ªãÁªçQuickAdapter.VHÁöÑÂÆûÁé∞Ôºö 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829static class VH extends RecyclerView.ViewHolder{ private SparseArray<View> mViews; private View mConvertView; private VH(View v){ super(v); mConvertView = v; mViews = new SparseArray<>(); } public static VH get(ViewGroup parent, int layoutId){ View convertView = LayoutInflater.from(parent.getContext()).inflate(layoutId, parent, false); return new VH(convertView); } public <T extends View> T getView(int id){ View v = mViews.get(id); if(v == null){ v = mConvertView.findViewById(id); mViews.put(id, v); } return (T)v; } public void setText(int id, String value){ TextView view = getView(id); view.setText(value); }} ÂÖ∂‰∏≠ÁöÑÂÖ≥ÈîÆÁÇπÂú®‰∫éÈÄöËøáSparseArray<View>Â≠òÂÇ®item viewÁöÑÊéß‰ª∂ÔºågetView(int id)ÁöÑÂäüËÉΩÂ∞±ÊòØÈÄöËøáidËé∑ÂæóÂØπÂ∫îÁöÑViewÔºàÈ¶ñÂÖàÂú®mViews‰∏≠Êü•ËØ¢ÊòØÂê¶Â≠òÂú®ÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûúÊ≤°ÊúâÔºåÈÇ£‰πàfindViewById()Âπ∂ÊîæÂÖ•mViews‰∏≠ÔºåÈÅøÂÖç‰∏ãÊ¨°ÂÜçÊâßË°åfindViewById()Ôºâ„ÄÇ QuickAdapterÁöÑÂÆûÁé∞Â¶Ç‰∏ãÔºö 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455public abstract class QuickAdapter<T> extends RecyclerView.Adapter<QuickAdapter.VH>{ private List<T> mDatas; public QuickAdapter(List<T> datas){ this.mDatas = datas; } public abstract int getLayoutId(int viewType); @Override public VH onCreateViewHolder(ViewGroup parent, int viewType) { return VH.get(parent,getLayoutId(viewType)); } @Override public void onBindViewHolder(VH holder, int position) { convert(holder, mDatas.get(position), position); } @Override public int getItemCount() { return mDatas.size(); } public abstract void convert(VH holder, T data, int position); static class VH extends RecyclerView.ViewHolder{ private SparseArray<View> mViews; private View mConvertView; private VH(View v){ super(v); mConvertView = v; mViews = new SparseArray<>(); } public static VH get(ViewGroup parent, int layoutId){ View convertView = LayoutInflater.from(parent.getContext()).inflate(layoutId, parent, false); return new VH(convertView); } public <T extends View> T getView(int id){ View v = mViews.get(id); if(v == null){ v = mConvertView.findViewById(id); mViews.put(id, v); } return (T)v; } public void setText(int id, String value){ TextView view = getView(id); view.setText(value); } }} ÂÖ∂‰∏≠Ôºö getLayoutId(int viewType)ÊòØÊ†πÊçÆviewTypeËøîÂõûÂ∏ÉÂ±ÄID„ÄÇ convert()ÂÅöÂÖ∑‰ΩìÁöÑbindÊìç‰Ωú„ÄÇ Â∞±ËøôÊ†∑Ôºå‰∏áËÉΩÈÄÇÈÖçÂô®ÂÆûÁé∞ÂÆåÊàê‰∫Ü„ÄÇ ÈÄöËøá‰∏áËÉΩÈÄÇÈÖçÂô®ËÉΩÈÄöËøá‰ª•‰∏ãÊñπÂºèÂø´Êç∑Âú∞ÂàõÂª∫‰∏Ä‰∏™AdapterÔºö 123456789101112mAdapter = new QuickAdapter<String>(data) { @Override public int getLayoutId(int viewType) { return R.layout.item; } @Override public void convert(VH holder, String data, int position) { holder.setText(R.id.text, data); //holder.itemView.setOnClickListener(); Ê≠§Â§ÑËøòÂèØ‰ª•Ê∑ªÂä†ÁÇπÂáª‰∫ã‰ª∂ }}; ÊòØ‰∏çÊòØÂæàÊñπ‰æø„ÄÇÂΩìÁÑ∂Â§çÊùÇÊÉÖÂÜµ‰πüÂèØ‰ª•ËΩªÊùæËß£ÂÜ≥„ÄÇ 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233mAdapter = new QuickAdapter<Model>(data) { @Override public int getLayoutId(int viewType) { switch(viewType){ case TYPE_1: return R.layout.item_1; case TYPE_2: return R.layout.item_2; } } @Override public int getItemViewType(int position) { if(position % 2 == 0){ return TYPE_1; } else{ return TYPE_2; } } @Override public void convert(VH holder, Model data, int position) { int type = getItemViewType(position); switch(type){ case TYPE_1: holder.setText(R.id.text, data.text); break; case TYPE_2: holder.setImage(R.id.image, data.image); break; } }}; ÁªìËÆ∫ Âú®‰∏Ä‰∫õÂú∫ÊôØ‰∏ãÔºåÂ¶ÇÁïåÈù¢ÂàùÂßãÂåñÔºåÊªëÂä®Á≠âÔºåListViewÂíåRecyclerViewÈÉΩËÉΩÂæàÂ•ΩÂú∞Â∑•‰ΩúÔºå‰∏§ËÄÖÂπ∂Ê≤°ÊúâÂæàÂ§ßÁöÑÂ∑ÆÂºÇÔºö Êï∞ÊçÆÊ∫êÈ¢ëÁπÅÊõ¥Êñ∞ÁöÑÂú∫ÊôØÔºåÂ¶ÇÂºπÂπïÔºöhttp://www.jianshu.com/p/2232a63442d6Á≠âRecyclerViewÁöÑ‰ºòÂäø‰ºöÈùûÂ∏∏ÊòéÊòæÔºõ Ëøõ‰∏ÄÊ≠•Êù•ËÆ≤ÔºåÁªìËÆ∫ÊòØÔºö ÂàóË°®È°µÂ±ïÁ§∫ÁïåÈù¢ÔºåÈúÄË¶ÅÊîØÊåÅÂä®ÁîªÔºåÊàñËÄÖÈ¢ëÁπÅÊõ¥Êñ∞ÔºåÂ±ÄÈÉ®Âà∑Êñ∞ÔºåÂª∫ËÆÆ‰ΩøÁî®RecyclerViewÔºåÊõ¥Âä†Âº∫Â§ßÂÆåÂñÑÔºåÊòìÊâ©Â±ïÔºõÂÖ∂ÂÆÉÊÉÖÂÜµ(Â¶ÇÂæÆ‰ø°Âç°ÂåÖÂàóË°®È°µ)‰∏§ËÄÖÈÉΩOKÔºå‰ΩÜListViewÂú®‰ΩøÁî®‰∏ä‰ºöÊõ¥Âä†Êñπ‰æøÔºåÂø´Êç∑„ÄÇ Êâ©Â±ïÈòÖËØª Google I/O 2016: RecyclerView Ins and Outs RecyclerView‰ºòÁßÄÊñáÁ´†ÈõÜ ÂºïÁî®Ôºö ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖRecyclerView ÂøÖÁü•ÂøÖ‰ºö ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖAndroid ListView ‰∏é RecyclerView ‰∏ÄÁØáÂçöÂÆ¢ÁêÜËß£RecyclerviewÁöÑ‰ΩøÁî® RecyclerView‰ΩøÁî®ÂÖ®Ëß£Êûê DemoÂú∞ÂùÄÔºö RecyclerViewÂü∫Êú¨Áî®Ê≥ï RecyclerViewDemo Demo1: RecyclerViewÊ∑ªÂä†HeaderViewÂíåFooterViewÔºåItemDecorationËåÉ‰æã„ÄÇ Demo2: ListViewÂÆûÁé∞Â±ÄÈÉ®Âà∑Êñ∞„ÄÇ Demo3: RecyclerViewÂÆûÁé∞ÊãñÊãΩ„ÄÅ‰æßÊªëÂà†Èô§„ÄÇ Demo4: RecyclerViewÈó™Â±èÈóÆÈ¢ò„ÄÇ Demo5: RecyclerViewÂÆûÁé∞setEmptyView()„ÄÇ Demo6: ÊûÑÈÄ†ÂèëÈÄÅ‰ø°ÊÅØÁ±ªÔºö 1234567public class StickyEvent { public String msg; public StickyEvent(String msg) { this.msg = msg; }} ÂèëÂ∏ÉÊ∂àÊÅØÔºöEventBus.getDefault().postSticky(new StickyEvent(‚ÄúÊàëÊòØÁ≤òÊÄß‰∫ã‰ª∂‚Äù)); Êé•Êî∂Ê∂àÊÅØÔºöÂíå‰πãÂâçÁöÑÊñπÊ≥ï‰∏ÄÊ†∑ÔºåÂè™ÊòØÂ§ö‰∫Ü‰∏Ä‰∏™ sticky = true ÁöÑÂ±ûÊÄß„ÄÇ 1234@Subscribe(threadMode = ThreadMode.MAIN, sticky = true)public void onEvent(StickyEvent event){ tv_c_result.setText(event.msg);} Ê≥®ÂÜåÔºö 1EventBus.getDefault().register(CActivity.this); Ëß£Ê≥®ÂÜåÔºö 12EventBus.getDefault().removeAllStickyEvents();EventBus.getDefault().unregister(CActivity.class); ### Âõõ„ÄÅ‰∏æ‰∏™Ê†óÂ≠ê ‰∏ªÁ∫øÁ®ãÂèëÈÄÅ‰∫ã‰ª∂Ôºö Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâ‰∫ã‰ª∂ÔºàÁ±ª‰ººÂÆö‰πâJavaBeanÔºâÔºåÂåÖÂê´Áî®Êà∑ÁöÑÂßìÂêçÂíåÂØÜÁ†ÅÔºõ 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536public class UserEvent { private String name; private String password; public UserEvent() { } public UserEvent(String name, String password) { this.name = name; this.password = password; } public String getName() { return name; } public void setName(String name) { this.name = name; } public String getPassword() { return password; } public void setPassword(String password) { this.password = password; } @Override public String toString() { return "UserEvent{" + "name='" + name + '\'' + ", password='" + password + '\'' + '}'; }} Âú®onCreateÊñπÊ≥ï‰∏≠Ê≥®ÂÜåËÆ¢ÈòÖËÄÖÔºåÂú®onDestroy‰∏≠Ëß£Ê≥®ÂÜå„ÄÇ 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142public class MainActivity extends AppCompatActivity { @BindView(R.id.jump) Button mJump; @BindView(R.id.send) Button mSend; @BindView(R.id.tv_result) TextView mTvResult; @Override protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) { super.onCreate(savedInstanceState); setContentView(R.layout.activity_main); ButterKnife.bind(this); //Ê≥®ÂÜåËÆ¢ÈòÖËÄÖ EventBus.getDefault().register(this); } @OnClick({R.id.jump, R.id.send}) public void onViewClicked(View view) { switch (view.getId()) { case R.id.jump: startActivity(new Intent(MainActivity.this, SecActivity.class)); break; case R.id.send: break; } } //ÂÆö‰πâÂ§ÑÁêÜÊé•Êî∂ÁöÑÊñπÊ≥ï @Subscribe(threadMode = ThreadMode.MAIN) public void userEventBus(UserEvent userEvent){ mTvResult.setText(userEvent.toString()); } @Override protected void onDestroy() { super.onDestroy(); //Ê≥®ÈîÄÊ≥®ÂÜå EventBus.getDefault().unregister(this); }} Âú®Âè¶‰∏Ä‰∏™activity‰∏≠ÂèëÈÄÅ‰∫ã‰ª∂ÔºåËÆ©ËÆ¢ÈòÖËÄÖËÉΩÂ§üÊé•Êî∂Ôºõ 123456789101112@OnClick({R.id.sendData, R.id.receive})public void onViewClicked(View view) { switch (view.getId()) { case R.id.sendData: //ÂèëÈÄÅ‰∫ã‰ª∂ EventBus.getDefault().post(new UserEvent("Mr.sorrow", "123456")); finish(); break; case R.id.receive: break; }} ÂÆûÁé∞ÁªìÊûúÔºö ÂèëÈÄÅÁ≤òÊÄß‰∫ã‰ª∂Ôºö MainActivity‰∏≠ÂèëÈÄÅÁ≤òÊÄß‰∫ã‰ª∂Ôºõ 1234case R.id.send: EventBus.getDefault().postSticky(new MessageEvent("Á≤òÊÄß‰∫ã‰ª∂", "urgent")); startActivity(new Intent(MainActivity.this, SecActivity.class)); break; SecActivity‰∏≠Êé•ÂèóÊ≥®ÂÜåÂπ∂Â§ÑÁêÜÔºõ 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344public class SecActivity extends AppCompatActivity { @BindView(R.id.sendData) Button mSendData; @BindView(R.id.receive) Button mReceive; @BindView(R.id.tv_receive) TextView mTvReceive; @Override protected void onCreate(@Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) { super.onCreate(savedInstanceState); setContentView(R.layout.activity_sec); ButterKnife.bind(this); } @OnClick({R.id.sendData, R.id.receive}) public void onViewClicked(View view) { switch (view.getId()) { case R.id.sendData: //ÂèëÈÄÅ‰∫ã‰ª∂ EventBus.getDefault().post(new UserEvent("Mr.sorrow", "123456")); finish(); break; case R.id.receive: //Ë¶ÅÊé•Êî∂Êó∂ÂºÄÂßãÊ≥®ÂÜå EventBus.getDefault().register(SecActivity.this); break; } } //Â§ÑÁêÜ‰∫ã‰ª∂ÈÄªËæë @Subscribe(threadMode = ThreadMode.MAIN, sticky = true) public void receiveEventBus(MessageEvent messageEvent) { mTvReceive.setText(messageEvent.toString()); } @Override protected void onDestroy() { super.onDestroy(); //Ëß£Ê≥®ÂÜå EventBus.getDefault().removeAllStickyEvents(); EventBus.getDefault().unregister(SecActivity.this); }} ÂÆûÁé∞ÊïàÊûú

(i != 0) { //Â¶ÇÊûú‰∏çÊòØÁ¨¨‰∏Ä‰∏™ÁÇπÔºåÂàôËÆæÁΩÆÁÇπÁöÑÂ∑¶ËæπË∑ù layoutParams.leftMargin = 10; } pointView.setEnabled(false); //ÈªòËÆ§ÈÉΩÊòØÊöóËâ≤ÁöÑ ll_point.addView(pointView, layoutParams); } } /* ÂàùÂßãÂåñÈÄÇÈÖçÂô® */ private void initAdapter() { ll_point.getChildAt(0).setEnabled(true); //ÂàùÂßãÂåñÊéß‰ª∂Êó∂ÔºåËÆæÁΩÆÁ¨¨‰∏Ä‰∏™Â∞èÂúÜÁÇπ‰∏∫‰∫ÆËâ≤ tv_desc.setText(contentDescs[0]); //ËÆæÁΩÆÁ¨¨‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂõæÁâáÂØπÂ∫îÁöÑÊñáÂ≠ó lastPosition = 0; //ËÆæÁΩÆ‰πãÂâçÁöÑ‰ΩçÁΩÆ‰∏∫Á¨¨‰∏Ä‰∏™ vp.setAdapter(new MyPagerAdapter()); //ËÆæÁΩÆÈªòËÆ§ÊòæÁ§∫‰∏≠Èó¥ÁöÑÊüê‰∏™‰ΩçÁΩÆÔºàËøôÊ†∑ÂèØ‰ª•Â∑¶Âè≥ÊªëÂä®ÔºâÔºåËøô‰∏™Êï∞Âè™ÊúâÂú®Êï¥Êï∞ËåÉÂõ¥ÂÜÖÔºåÂèØ‰ª•Èöè‰æøËÆæÁΩÆ vp.setCurrentItem(5000000); //ÊòæÁ§∫5000000Ëøô‰∏™‰ΩçÁΩÆÁöÑÂõæÁâá } //ÁïåÈù¢ÈîÄÊØÅÊó∂ÔºåÂÅúÊ≠¢viewpagerÁöÑËΩÆËØ¢ @Override protected void onDestroy() { super.onDestroy(); isRunning = false; } //--------------‰ª•‰∏ãÊòØËÆæÁΩÆViewPagerÁöÑÊªöÂä®ÁõëÂê¨ÊâÄÈúÄÂÆûÁé∞ÁöÑÊñπÊ≥ï-------- //È°µÈù¢ÊªëÂä® @Override public void onPageScrolled(int position, float positionOffset, int positionOffsetPixels) { } //Êñ∞ÁöÑÈ°µÈù¢Ë¢´ÈÄâ‰∏≠ @Override public void onPageSelected(int position) { //ÂΩìÂâçÁöÑ‰ΩçÁΩÆÂèØËÉΩÂæàÂ§ßÔºå‰∏∫‰∫ÜÈò≤Ê≠¢‰∏ãÊ†áË∂äÁïåÔºåÂØπË¶ÅÊòæÁ§∫ÁöÑÂõæÁâáÁöÑÊÄªÊï∞ËøõË°åÂèñ‰Ωô int newPosition = position % 5; //ËÆæÁΩÆÊèèËø∞‰ø°ÊÅØ tv_desc.setText(contentDescs[newPosition]); //ËÆæÁΩÆÂ∞èÂúÜÁÇπ‰∏∫È´ò‰∫ÆÊàñÊöóËâ≤ ll_point.getChildAt(lastPosition).setEnabled(false); ll_point.getChildAt(newPosition).setEnabled(true); lastPosition = newPosition; //ËÆ∞ÂΩï‰πãÂâçÁöÑÁÇπ } //È°µÈù¢ÊªëÂä®Áä∂ÊÄÅÂèëÁîüÊîπÂèò @Override public void onPageScrollStateChanged(int state) { } /** * Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâÈÄÇÈÖçÂô®ÔºåÁªßÊâøËá™PagerAdapter */ class MyPagerAdapter extends PagerAdapter { //ËøîÂõûÊòæÁ§∫Êï∞ÊçÆÁöÑÊÄªÊù°Êï∞Ôºå‰∏∫‰∫ÜÂÆûÁé∞Êó†ÈôêÂæ™ÁéØÔºåÊääËøîÂõûÁöÑÂÄºËÆæÁΩÆ‰∏∫ÊúÄÂ§ßÊï¥Êï∞ @Override public int getCount() { return Integer.MAX_VALUE; } //ÊåáÂÆöÂ§çÁî®ÁöÑÂà§Êñ≠ÈÄªËæëÔºåÂõ∫ÂÆöÂÜôÊ≥ïÔºöview == object @Override public boolean isViewFromObject(View view, Object object) { //ÂΩìÂàõÂª∫Êñ∞ÁöÑÊù°ÁõÆÔºåÂèàÂèçÂõûÊù•ÔºåÂà§Êñ≠viewÊòØÂê¶ÂèØ‰ª•Ë¢´Â§çÁî®(Âç≥ÊòØÂê¶Â≠òÂú®) return view == object; } //ËøîÂõûË¶ÅÊòæÁ§∫ÁöÑÊù°ÁõÆÂÜÖÂÆπ @Override public Object instantiateItem(ViewGroup container, int position) { //container ÂÆπÂô® Áõ∏ÂΩì‰∫éÁî®Êù•Â≠òÊîæimageView //‰ªéÈõÜÂêà‰∏≠Ëé∑ÂæóÂõæÁâá int newPosition = position % 5; //Êï∞ÁªÑ‰∏≠ÊÄªÂÖ±Êúâ5Âº†ÂõæÁâáÔºåË∂ÖËøáÊï∞ÁªÑÈïøÂ∫¶Êó∂ÔºåÂèñÊë∏ÔºåÈò≤Ê≠¢‰∏ãÊ†áË∂äÁïå ImageView imageView = imageViews.get(newPosition); //ÊääÂõæÁâáÊ∑ªÂä†Âà∞container‰∏≠ container.addView(imageView); //ÊääÂõæÁâáËøîÂõûÁªôÊ°ÜÊû∂ÔºåÁî®Êù•ÁºìÂ≠ò return imageView; } //ÈîÄÊØÅÊù°ÁõÆ @Override public void destroyItem(ViewGroup container, int position, Object object) { //object:ÂàöÊâçÂàõÂª∫ÁöÑÂØπË±°ÔºåÂç≥Ë¶ÅÈîÄÊØÅÁöÑÂØπË±° container.removeView((View) object); } }}

entry.content: uri & file ‰∫íËΩ¨1File file = new File(new URI(uri.toString())); 1URI uri = file.toURI(); uri & path ‰∫íËΩ¨1234567private String getPath(Uri uri) { String[] projection = {MediaStore.Video.Media.DATA}; Cursor cursor = managedQuery(uri, projection, null, null, null); int column_index = cursor.getColumnIndexOrThrow(MediaStore.Audio.Media.DATA); cursor.moveToFirst(); return cursor.getString(column_index); } 1Uri uri = Uri.parse(path); file & path ‰∫íËΩ¨1String path = file.getPath() 1File file = new File(path)

ÂÖçË¥π„ÄÅÊü≥Ê†ëÊ≤ü70ÂÖÉ/‰∫∫„ÄÅÂçÉÊùæÂùùÊ£ÆÊûóÂÖ¨Âõ≠100ÂÖÉ/‰∫∫„ÄÅÂ§ßÊ±óË°åÂÆ´90ÂÖÉ/‰∫∫„ÄÅÈó™ÁîµÊπñ30ÂÖÉ/‰∫∫„ÄÅËÄÅÊéåÊ≤ü20ÂÖÉ/‰∫∫„ÄÅËçâÂéüÂ§©Ë∑Ø ÂÖçË¥πÔºõ‰ª•‰∏äÈó®Á•®‰ΩèÂÆøÂí±ÂÆ∂ÈÉΩÊúâÊäòÊâ£Á•®„ÄÇ ÂèëÁ•®Ôºö‰∏çÂê´ÂèëÁ•®ÔºåÂºÄÂèëÁ•®ÈúÄË¶ÅÂè¶Â§ñÂä†6%Á®éÁÇπÔºõ Âùù‰∏äËçâÂéüÊóÖÊ∏∏Ê≥®ÊÑè‰∫ãÈ°π1„ÄÅÂùù‰∏äÈ£éÂ§ßÔºåÊó©ÊôöÊ∏©Â∑ÆÂ§ßÔºåÂª∫ËÆÆÂ§öÂ∏¶‰∫õË°£Áâ©„ÄÇ2„ÄÅËçâÂéüÈò≥ÂÖâËæÉÊôíÔºåÂ∫îÊà¥Â§™Èò≥Èïú„ÄÅÂ∏ΩÂ≠êÂπ∂Ê∂ÇÊäπÈò≤ÊôíÈúú„ÄÇ3„ÄÅËçâÂéüÂ∏∏ÊúâÈõ∑Èõ®Â§©Ê∞îÔºåÈõ®ÂÖ∑Â∫îÂøÖÂ§á„ÄÇ4„ÄÅÂùù‰∏äËçâÂéüÊúâÂæàÂ§öÁöÑÊùëÂ∫ÑÔºåËôΩÁÑ∂Â∑≤ÁªèÂ§öÂπ¥Êé•ÂæÖÊ∏∏ÂÆ¢Ôºå‰ΩÜÊòØÂ±±Êùë‰∫∫Ë¥®Êú¥„ÄÅÂçïÁ∫ØÁöÑÊÄßÊ†ºËøòÊòØÁªôÊ∏∏ÂÆ¢Â∏¶Êù•ÂæàÂ§öÁöÑÊ∏©È¶®Ôºå‰Ω†Êï¨‰ªñ‰∏ÄÂ∞∫Ôºå‰ªñÊï¨‰Ω†‰∏Ä‰∏àÔºåÂèç‰πã‰πüÊòØ‰∏ÄÊ†∑„ÄÇÊâÄ‰ª•Â§Ñ‰∫ãË¶Å‰ª•Âíå‰∏∫Ë¥µÔºåËÉΩÈ•∂‰∫∫Â§Ñ‰∏îÈ•∂‰∫∫ÔºåÂçÉ‰∏á‰∏çÂèØÊÑüÊÉÖÁî®‰∫ãÔºåÊúâ‰∫ãÂ§öÂíåÊÇ®ÊâÄ‰ΩèÁöÑÈÖíÂ∫óÊóÖÈ¶Ü„ÄÅÂÜúÂÆ∂Â∞èÈô¢ÁöÑË¥üË¥£‰∫∫ÂïÜÈáèÔºåÊ±ÇÂÖ∂Â∏ÆÂä©Ëß£ÂÜ≥„ÄÇÊù•Âùù‰∏äËçâÂéüÔºåÂ∞ΩÈáèÈÅøÂÖçÂë®Êú´‰∫∫Â§öÁöÑÁöÑÊó∂ÂÄôÔºåÊ†πÊçÆ‰ª•ÂæÄÁöÑÁªèÈ™åÔºåÂë®‰∏ÄÂà∞Âë®ÂõõÂè∑‰∫∫Áõ∏ÂØπÂ∞ë‰∫õÔºåÂêÑÊñπÈù¢ÁöÑ‰ª∑Ê†º‰πüÁõ∏ÂØπ‰Ωé‰∏Ä‰∫õ„ÄÇ5„ÄÅÂºÄÂøÉ‰πãÊó∂Ë¶ÅÁâπÂà´Ê≥®ÊÑèÁÆ°ÁêÜÂ•ΩËá™Â∑±ÁöÑ‰∏úË•ø„ÄÇÁî±‰∫éÊóÖÊ∏∏Âå∫‰∫∫ÂëòËæÉÂ§ö„ÄÅÊØîËæÉÊùÇÔºåË¶ÅÁâπÂà´Â∞èÂøÉ„ÄÇÈ™ëÈ©¨ÊòØÂæàÂ§ö‰∫∫ÂñúÂ•ΩÁöÑÂ®±‰πêÂíåÂÅ•Ë∫´Ê¥ªÂä®„ÄÇÂ§ñÂá∫È™ëÈ©¨ÊòØ‰∏ÄÂÆöË¶ÅÊîæÂ•ΩËá™Â∑±ÁöÑ‰∏úË•øÔºåÂ∞ΩÈáè‰∏çË¶ÅÂ∏¶ÊâãÊú∫ÂíåÈí±ÂåÖÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûúÂ∏¶‰∏ÄÂÆöË¶ÅÊîæÂú®Â¶•ÂñÑÁöÑ„ÄÅ‰∏çÊòì‰∏¢ÊéâÁöÑÂú∞Êñπ„ÄÇÂõ†‰∏∫È™ëÈ©¨‰ºö‰∏ä‰∏ãÈ¢†Á∞∏ÔºåÂè£Ë¢ãÈáåÁöÑ‰∏úË•øÂæàÂÆπÊòìÊéâÂá∫Êù•ÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•ÔºåÈ™ëÈ©¨‰∏¢ÊâãÊú∫„ÄÅÈí±ÂåÖ„ÄÅÁúºÈïú„ÄÅÁÖßÁõ∏Êú∫„ÄÅÊâãË°®„ÄÅÈí•Âåô„ÄÅÊâìÁÅ´Êú∫„ÄÅÈ¶ôÁÉüÁ≠âÁöÑ‰∫∫‰∏çÂ∞ë„ÄÇ6„ÄÅÊîæÈû≠ÁÇÆ„ÄÅÂºÄË∂äÈáéËΩ¶„ÄÅÂõõÈ©±„ÄÅÊë©ÊâòËΩ¶Á≠âÈÉΩË¶ÅÊ≥®ÊÑèÂÆâÂÖ®ÔºåÂÆâÂÖ®Á¨¨‰∏Ä„ÄÇ

entry.title: ÂΩïÈü≥SoundRecording
entry.content: ÊïàÊûúÂõæ È¶ñÈ°µ ÂΩïÈü≥ Êí≠Êîæ ÂÆûÁé∞ÂΩïÈü≥ÁöÑ ServiceËøô‰∏™Á±ªÂèØ‰ª•ËØ¥ÊòØËøô‰∏™ÂåÖÁöÑÊ†∏ÂøÉ‰∫ÜÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûúÁêÜËß£‰∫ÜËøô‰∏™ ServiceÔºåÂΩïÈü≥Ëøô‰∏ÄÂùóÂü∫Êú¨Â∞±Ê≤°‰ªÄ‰πàÈóÆÈ¢ò‰∫Ü„ÄÇ ÂΩïÈü≥‰∏ªË¶ÅÊòØÂà©Áî® MediaRecoder Ëøô‰∏™Á±ªÔºåËøõË°åÂ£∞Èü≥ÁöÑËÆ∞ÂΩïÔºåÊé•‰∏ãÊù•Êàë‰ª¨‰∏ÄËµ∑Êù•ÁúãÁúãÂÖ∑‰ΩìÁöÑÂÆûÁé∞„ÄÇ 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667686970717273747576777879808182838485868788899091public class RecordingService extends Service { private static final String LOG_TAG = "RecordingService"; private String mFileName = null; private String mFilePath = null; private MediaRecorder mRecorder = null; private long mStartingTimeMillis = 0; private long mElapsedMillis = 0; private TimerTask mIncrementTimerTask = null; @Override public IBinder onBind(Intent intent) { return null; } @Override public void onCreate() { super.onCreate(); } @Override public int onStartCommand(Intent intent, int flags, int startId) { startRecording(); return START_STICKY; } @Override public void onDestroy() { if (mRecorder != null) { stopRecording(); } super.onDestroy(); } public void startRecording() { setFileNameAndPath(); mRecorder = new MediaRecorder(); mRecorder.setAudioSource(MediaRecorder.AudioSource.MIC); mRecorder.setOutputFormat(MediaRecorder.OutputFormat.MPEG_4); mRecorder.setOutputFile(mFilePath); mRecorder.setAudioEncoder(MediaRecorder.AudioEncoder.AAC); mRecorder.setAudioChannels(1); mRecorder.setAudioSamplingRate(44100); mRecorder.setAudioEncodingBitRate(192000); try { mRecorder.prepare(); mRecorder.start(); mStartingTimeMillis = System.currentTimeMillis(); } catch (IOException e) { Log.e(LOG_TAG, "prepare() failed"); } } public void setFileNameAndPath() { int count = 0; File f; do { count++; mFileName = getString(R.string.default_file_name) + "_" + (System.currentTimeMillis()) + ".mp4"; mFilePath = Environment.getExternalStorageDirectory().getAbsolutePath(); mFilePath += "/SoundRecorder/" + mFileName; f = new File(mFilePath); } while (f.exists() && !f.isDirectory()); } public void stopRecording() { mRecorder.stop(); mElapsedMillis = (System.currentTimeMillis() - mStartingTimeMillis); mRecorder.release(); getSharedPreferences("sp_name_audio", MODE_PRIVATE) .edit() .putString("audio_path", mFilePath) .putLong("elpased", mElapsedMillis) .apply(); if (mIncrementTimerTask != null) { mIncrementTimerTask.cancel(); mIncrementTimerTask = null; } mRecorder = null; }} ÂèØ‰ª•ÁúãÂà∞Âú® onStartCommand() ÈáåÈù¢Êúâ‰∏Ä‰∏™ startRecording() ÊñπÊ≥ïÔºåÂú®Â§ñÈÉ®ÂêØÂä®Ëøô‰∏™ RecordingService ÁöÑÊó∂ÂÄôÔºå‰æø‰ºöË∞ÉÁî®Ëøô‰∏™ startRecording() ÊñπÊ≥ïÂºÄÂßãÂΩïÈü≥„ÄÇ Âú® startRecording() ÊñπÊ≥ï‰∏≠ÂÖàË∞ÉÁî®‰∫Ü setFileNameAndPath ÊñπÊ≥ïÔºåÂàùÂßãÂåñ‰∫ÜÂΩïÈü≥Êñá‰ª∂ÁöÑÂêçÂ≠óÂíå‰øùÂ≠òÁöÑË∑ØÂæÑÔºå‰∏∫‰∫ÜËÆ©ÊØè‰∏™ÂΩïÈü≥Êñá‰ª∂ÈÉΩÊúâÂîØ‰∏ÄÁöÑÂêçÂ≠óÔºåÊàëË∞ÉÁî® System.currentMillis() ÊãºÊé•Âà∞ÂΩïÈü≥Êñá‰ª∂ÁöÑÂêçÂ≠óÈáåÈù¢„ÄÇ 12345678910111213public void setFileNameAndPath() { int count = 0; File f; do { count++; mFileName = getString(R.string.default_file_name) + "_" + (System.currentTimeMillis()) + ".mp4"; mFilePath = Environment.getExternalStorageDirectory().getAbsolutePath(); mFilePath += "/SoundRecorder/" + mFileName; f = new File(mFilePath); } while (f.exists() && !f.isDirectory());} ËÆæÁΩÆÂ•Ω‰∫ÜÊñá‰ª∂ÁöÑÂêçÂ≠óÂíå‰øùÂ≠òË∑ØÂæÑ‰πãÂêéÔºåÂØπ mRecorder ËøõË°å‰∏ÄÁ≥ªÂàóÂèÇÊï∞ÁöÑËÆæÁΩÆÔºåËøô‰∏™mRecorder ÊòØ MediaRecorder ÁöÑ‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂÆû‰æãÔºå‰∏ìÈó®Áî®‰∫éÂΩïÈü≥ÁöÑÂ≠òÂÇ®„ÄÇ 1234567891011121314151617181920public void startRecording() { setFileNameAndPath(); mRecorder = new MediaRecorder(); mRecorder.setAudioSource(MediaRecorder.AudioSource.MIC); mRecorder.setOutputFormat(MediaRecorder.OutputFormat.MPEG_4); mRecorder.setOutputFile(mFilePath); mRecorder.setAudioEncoder(MediaRecorder.AudioEncoder.AAC); mRecorder.setAudioChannels(1); mRecorder.setAudioSamplingRate(44100); mRecorder.setAudioEncodingBitRate(192000); try { mRecorder.prepare(); mRecorder.start(); mStartingTimeMillis = System.currentTimeMillis(); } catch (IOException e) { Log.e(LOG_TAG, "prepare() failed"); }} ËÆæÁΩÆÂ•ΩÂèÇÊï∞‰πãÂêéÔºåÂêØÂä® mRecorder ÂºÄÂßãÂΩïÈü≥ÔºåÂèØ‰ª•ÁúãÂà∞ÂêØÂä® mRecorder ÂºÄÂßãÂΩïÈü≥ÂêéÔºåÊàëËøòÂ∞ÜÂΩìÂâçÁöÑÊó∂Èó¥ËµãÂÄºÁªô mStartingTimeMillsÔºåËøôÈáå‰∏ªË¶ÅÊòØ‰∏∫‰∫ÜËÆ∞ÂΩïÂΩïÈü≥ÁöÑÊó∂ÈïøÔºåÁ≠âÂà∞ÂΩïÈü≥ÁªìÊùüÂêéÂÜçËé∑Âèñ‰∏ÄÊ¨°ÂΩìÂâçÁöÑÊó∂Èó¥ÔºåÁÑ∂ÂêéÂ∞Ü‰∏§‰∏™Êó∂Èó¥ËøõË°åÁõ∏ÂáèÔºåÂ∞±ËÉΩÂæóÂà∞ÂΩïÈü≥ÁöÑÂÖ∑‰ΩìÊó∂Èïø‰∫Ü„ÄÇ Á≠âÂà∞ÂΩïÈü≥ÁªìÊùüÔºåÂÅúÊ≠¢ÊúçÂä°ÂêéÔºå‰æø‰ºöÂõûË∞É RecordingService ÁöÑ onDestroy() ÊñπÊ≥ïÔºåËøôÊó∂ÂÄô‰æø‰ºöË∞ÉÁî® stopRecording() ÊñπÊ≥ïÔºåÂÖ≥Èó≠ mRecorderÔºåÂπ∂Áî® SharedPreferences ‰øùÂ≠òÂΩïÈü≥Êñá‰ª∂ÁöÑ‰ø°ÊÅØÔºåÊúÄÂêéÂ∞Ü mRecorder ÁΩÆÁ©∫ÔºåÈò≤Ê≠¢ÂÜÖÂ≠òÊ≥ÑÈú≤„ÄÇ 1234567891011121314151617public void stopRecording() { mRecorder.stop(); mElapsedMillis = (System.currentTimeMillis() - mStartingTimeMillis); mRecorder.release(); getSharedPreferences("sp_name_audio", MODE_PRIVATE) .edit() .putString("audio_path", mFilePath) .putLong("elpased", mElapsedMillis) .apply(); if (mIncrementTimerTask != null) { mIncrementTimerTask.cancel(); mIncrementTimerTask = null; } mRecorder = null;} ÊòæÁ§∫ÂΩïÈü≥ÁïåÈù¢ÁöÑ  class RecordAudioDialogFragment extends DialogFragment { private static final String TAG = "RecordAudioDialogFragme"; private int mRecordPromptCount = 0; private boolean mStartRecording = true; private boolean mPauseRecording = true; long timeWhenPaused = 0; private FloatingActionButton mFabRecord; private Chronometer mChronometerTime; private ImageView mIvClose; private OnAudioCancelListener mListener; public static RecordAudioDialogFragment newInstance() { RecordAudioDialogFragment dialogFragment = new RecordAudioDialogFragment(); Bundle bundle = new Bundle(); dialogFragment.setArguments(bundle); return dialogFragment; } @Override public void onCreate(@Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) { super.onCreate(savedInstanceState); } @Override public void onActivityCreated(Bundle savedInstanceState) { super.onActivityCreated(savedInstanceState); } @NonNull @Override public Dialog onCreateDialog(Bundle savedInstanceState) { Dialog dialog = super.onCreateDialog(savedInstanceState); final AlertDialog.Builder builder = new AlertDialog.Builder(getActivity()); View view = getActivity().getLayoutInflater().inflate(R.layout.fragment_record_audio, null); initView(view); mFabRecord.setColorNormal(getResources().getColor(R.color.colorAccent)); mFabRecord.setColorPressed(getResources().getColor(R.color.colorAccent)); mFabRecord.setOnClickListener(new View.OnClickListener() { @Override public void onClick(View v) { if (ContextCompat.checkSelfPermission(getActivity(), Manifest.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE) != PackageManager.PERMISSION_GRANTED) { ActivityCompat.requestPermissions(getActivity() , new String[]{Manifest.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE, Manifest.permission.RECORD_AUDIO}, 1); } else { onRecord(mStartRecording); mStartRecording = !mStartRecording; } } }); mIvClose.setOnClickListener(new View.OnClickListener() { @Override public void onClick(View v) { mListener.onCancel(); } }); builder.setCancelable(false); builder.setView(view); return builder.create(); } private void initView(View view) { mChronometerTime = (Chronometer) view.findViewById(R.id.record_audio_chronometer_time); mFabRecord = (FloatingActionButton) view.findViewById(R.id.record_audio_fab_record); mIvClose = (ImageView) view.findViewById(R.id.record_audio_iv_close); } Intent intent; private void onRecord(boolean start) { intent = new Intent(getActivity(), RecordingService.class); if (start) { // start recording mFabRecord.setImageResource(R.drawable.ic_media_stop); //mPauseButton.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE); Toast.makeText(getActivity(), "ÂºÄÂßãÂΩïÈü≥...", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show(); File folder = new File(Environment.getExternalStorageDirectory() + "/SoundRecorder"); if (!folder.exists()) { //folder /SoundRecorder doesn't exist, create the folder folder.mkdir(); } //start Chronometer mChronometerTime.setBase(SystemClock.elapsedRealtime()); mChronometerTime.start(); //start RecordingService getActivity().startService(intent); //keep screen on while recording// getActivity().getWindow().addFlags(WindowManager.LayoutParams.FLAG_KEEP_SCREEN_ON); } else { //stop recording mFabRecord.setImageResource(R.drawable.ic_mic_white_36dp); //mPauseButton.setVisibility(View.GONE); mChronometerTime.stop(); timeWhenPaused = 0; Toast.makeText(getActivity(), "ÂΩïÈü≥ÁªìÊùü...", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show(); getActivity().stopService(intent); //allow the screen to turn off again once recording is finished getActivity().getWindow().clearFlags(WindowManager.LayoutParams.FLAG_KEEP_SCREEN_ON); } } @Override public void onDestroyView() { if (!mStartRecording) { //stop recording mFabRecord.setImageResource(R.drawable.ic_mic_white_36dp); //mPauseButton.setVisibility(View.GONE); mChronometerTime.stop(); timeWhenPaused = 0; Toast.makeText(getActivity(), "ÂΩïÈü≥ÁªìÊùü...", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show(); getActivity().stopService(intent); //allow the screen to turn off again once recording is finished getActivity().getWindow().clearFlags(WindowManager.LayoutParams.FLAG_KEEP_SCREEN_ON); } super.onDestroyView(); } public void setOnCancelListener(OnAudioCancelListener listener) { this.mListener = listener; } @Override public void onRequestPermissionsResult(int requestCode, @NonNull String[] permissions, @NonNull int[] grantResults) { switch (requestCode) { case 1: if (grantResults.length > 0 && grantResults[0] == PackageManager.PERMISSION_GRANTED && grantResults[1] == PackageManager.PERMISSION_GRANTED) { onRecord(mStartRecording); } break; } } public interface OnAudioCancelListener { void onCancel(); }} ÂèØ‰ª•ÁúãÂà∞Âú® RecordAudioDialogFragment Êúâ‰∏Ä‰∏™ newInstance(int maxTime) ÁöÑÈùôÊÄÅÊñπÊ≥ï‰æõÂ§ñÈÉ®Ë∞ÉÁî®ÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûúÊÉ≥ËÆæÁΩÆÂΩïÈü≥ÁöÑÊúÄÂ§ßÊó∂ÈïøÔºåÁõ¥Êé•‰º†ÂèÇÊï∞ËøõÂéªÂ∞±Ë°å‰∫Ü„ÄÇ Ëøô‰∏™ÂØπËØùÊ°ÜÁöÑÈáçÁÇπÈÉ®ÂàÜÂ∞±ÊòØÂú® onCreateDialog()‰∏≠ÔºåÊàë‰ª¨ÂÖàÂä†ËΩΩ‰∫ÜÊàë‰ª¨Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâÁöÑÂØπËØùÊ°ÜÁöÑÂ∏ÉÂ±ÄÔºåÂΩìÁÇπÂáªÂΩïÈü≥ÁöÑÊåâÈíÆÁöÑÊó∂ÂÄôÔºåÂÖàËøõË°åÁõ∏ÂÖ≥ÊùÉÈôêÁöÑÁî≥ËØ∑ÔºåÂΩïÈü≥ÊùÉÈôê android.permission.RECORD_AUDIO 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435public Dialog onCreateDialog(Bundle savedInstanceState) { Dialog dialog = super.onCreateDialog(savedInstanceState); final AlertDialog.Builder builder = new AlertDialog.Builder(getActivity()); View view = getActivity().getLayoutInflater().inflate(R.layout.fragment_record_audio, null); initView(view); mFabRecord.setColorNormal(getResources().getColor(R.color.colorAccent)); mFabRecord.setColorPressed(getResources().getColor(R.color.colorAccent)); mFabRecord.setOnClickListener(new View.OnClickListener() { @Override public void onClick(View v) { if (ContextCompat.checkSelfPermission(getActivity(), Manifest.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE) != PackageManager.PERMISSION_GRANTED) { ActivityCompat.requestPermissions(getActivity() , new String[]{Manifest.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE, Manifest.permission.RECORD_AUDIO}, 1); } else { onRecord(mStartRecording); mStartRecording = !mStartRecording; } } }); mIvClose.setOnClickListener(new View.OnClickListener() { @Override public void onClick(View v) { mListener.onCancel(); } }); builder.setCancelable(false); builder.setView(view); return builder.create();} Áî≥ËØ∑Â•ΩÊùÉÈôê‰πãÂêé‰æø‰ºöË∞ÉÁî® onRecord() Ëøô‰∏™ÊñπÊ≥ïÔºåÁÑ∂ÂêéÂ∞Ü boolean mStartRecording ËøõË°åÂèçËΩ¨ÔºåËøôÊ†∑Â∞±‰∏çÁî®ÂÜôÈöæÁúãÁöÑ if else ‰∫ÜÔºåÁõ¥Êé•ÊîπÂèò mStartRecording ÁöÑÂÄºÔºåÁÑ∂ÂêéÂú® onRecord() ÈáåÈù¢ËøõË°åÂ§ÑÁêÜ„ÄÇ 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738private void onRecord(boolean start) { intent = new Intent(getActivity(), RecordingService.class); if (start) { // start recording mFabRecord.setImageResource(R.drawable.ic_media_stop); //mPauseButton.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE); Toast.makeText(getActivity(), "ÂºÄÂßãÂΩïÈü≥...", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show(); File folder = new File(Environment.getExternalStorageDirectory() + "/SoundRecorder"); if (!folder.exists()) { //folder /SoundRecorder doesn't exist, create the folder folder.mkdir(); } //start Chronometer mChronometerTime.setBase(SystemClock.elapsedRealtime()); mChronometerTime.start(); //start RecordingService getActivity().startService(intent); //keep screen on while recording// getActivity().getWindow().addFlags(WindowManager.LayoutParams.FLAG_KEEP_SCREEN_ON); } else { //stop recording mFabRecord.setImageResource(R.drawable.ic_mic_white_36dp); //mPauseButton.setVisibility(View.GONE); mChronometerTime.stop(); timeWhenPaused = 0; Toast.makeText(getActivity(), "ÂΩïÈü≥ÁªìÊùü...", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show(); getActivity().stopService(intent); //allow the screen to turn off again once recording is finished getActivity().getWindow().clearFlags(WindowManager.LayoutParams.FLAG_KEEP_SCREEN_ON); } } ÂàõÂª∫‰∫Ü‰øùÂ≠òÂΩïÈü≥Êñá‰ª∂ÁöÑÊñá‰ª∂Â§πÔºåÁÑ∂ÂêéÊ†πÊçÆ mStartRecording ÁöÑÂÄºËøõË°å RecordingService ÁöÑÂêØÂä®ÂíåÂÖ≥Èó≠ÁΩ¢‰∫Ü„ÄÇÂú®ÂêØÂä®Êó∂ËøòÈ°∫‰æøÂºÄÂßã‰∫Ü mChronometer ÁöÑËÆ°Êó∂ÊòæÁ§∫ÔºåËøôÊòØ‰∏Ä‰∏™ Android ÂéüÁîüÁöÑÊòæÁ§∫ËÆ°Êó∂ÁöÑ‰∏Ä‰∏™Êéß‰ª∂„ÄÇ Êí≠ÊîæÂΩïÈü≥ÁöÑ PlaybackDialogFragmentÂ§ñÈÉ®Ë∞ÉÁî®Ëøô‰∏™ÂØπËØùÊ°ÜÁöÑÊó∂ÂÄôÔºåÂè™ÈúÄË¶Å‰º†ÂÖ•‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂåÖÂê´ÂΩïÈü≥Êñá‰ª∂‰ø°ÊÅØÁöÑ RecordingItemÔºåÂõ†‰∏∫ÂåÖÂê´ÁöÑ‰ø°ÊÅØÊØîËæÉÂ§öÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•ÊúÄÂ•ΩÂ∞Ü RecordingItem ËøõË°åÂ∫èÂàóÂåñ„ÄÇ 1234567public static PlaybackDialogFragment newInstance(RecordingItem item) { PlaybackDialogFragment f = new PlaybackDialogFragment(); Bundle b = new Bundle(); b.putParcelable(ARG_ITEM, item); f.setArguments(b); return f;} Êù•ÁúãÁúã onCreateDialog() ÊñπÊ≥ïÔºåÂú®Âä†ËΩΩ‰∫ÜÂ∏ÉÂ±Ä‰πãÂêéÔºåÁªô mSeekBar ËÆæÁΩÆÁõëÂê¨ÔºåmSeekBar ÊòØ‰∏Ä‰∏™ÊòæÁ§∫ËøõÂ∫¶Êù°ÁöÑÊéß‰ª∂ÔºåÂΩìÂºÄÂßãÊí≠ÊîæÂΩïÈü≥Êó∂ÂÄôÔºåÂ∞ÜÂΩïÈü≥Êñá‰ª∂ÁöÑÊó∂ÈïøÔºåËÆæÁΩÆËøõ mSeekBar ÈáåÈù¢ÔºåÊí≠ÊîæÂΩïÈü≥ÁöÑÂêåÊó∂ÔºåËøêË°å mSeekBarÔºåÈÄöËøáÁõëÂê¨ mSeekBar ÁöÑËøõÂ∫¶ÔºåÂà∑Êñ∞ÊòæÁ§∫ÁöÑÊí≠ÊîæËøõÂ∫¶„ÄÇ 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667686970717273747576777879public Dialog onCreateDialog(Bundle savedInstanceState) { Dialog dialog = super.onCreateDialog(savedInstanceState); AlertDialog.Builder builder = new AlertDialog.Builder(getActivity()); View view = getActivity().getLayoutInflater().inflate(R.layout.fragment_media_playback, null); mFileNameTextView = (TextView) view.findViewById(R.id.file_name_text_view); mFileLengthTextView = (TextView) view.findViewById(R.id.file_length_text_view); mCurrentProgressTextView = (TextView) view.findViewById(R.id.current_progress_text_view); mSeekBar = (SeekBar) view.findViewById(R.id.seekbar); ColorFilter filter = new LightingColorFilter (getResources().getColor(R.color.green), getResources().getColor(R.color.green)); mSeekBar.getProgressDrawable().setColorFilter(filter); mSeekBar.getThumb().setColorFilter(filter); mFileLengthTextView.setText(String.valueOf(mFileLength)); mSeekBar.setOnSeekBarChangeListener(new SeekBar.OnSeekBarChangeListener() { @Override public void onProgressChanged(SeekBar seekBar, int progress, boolean fromUser) { if(mMediaPlayer != null && fromUser) { mMediaPlayer.seekTo(progress); mHandler.removeCallbacks(mRunnable); long minutes = TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS.toMinutes(mMediaPlayer.getCurrentPosition()); long seconds = TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS.toSeconds(mMediaPlayer.getCurrentPosition()) - TimeUnit.MINUTES.toSeconds(minutes); mCurrentProgressTextView.setText(String.format("%02d:%02d", minutes,seconds)); updateSeekBar(); } else if (mMediaPlayer == null && fromUser) { prepareMediaPlayerFromPoint(progress); updateSeekBar(); } } @Override public void onStartTrackingTouch(SeekBar seekBar) { if(mMediaPlayer != null) { // remove message Handler from updating progress bar mHandler.removeCallbacks(mRunnable); } } @Override public void onStopTrackingTouch(SeekBar seekBar) { if (mMediaPlayer != null) { mHandler.removeCallbacks(mRunnable); mMediaPlayer.seekTo(seekBar.getProgress()); long minutes = TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS.toMinutes(mMediaPlayer.getCurrentPosition()); long seconds = TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS.toSeconds(mMediaPlayer.getCurrentPosition()) - TimeUnit.MINUTES.toSeconds(minutes); mCurrentProgressTextView.setText(String.format("%02d:%02d", minutes,seconds)); updateSeekBar(); } } }); mPlayButton = (FloatingActionButton) view.findViewById(R.id.fab_play); mPlayButton.setOnClickListener(new View.OnClickListener() { @Override public void onClick(View v) { onPlay(isPlaying); isPlaying = !isPlaying; } }); mFileNameTextView.setText(item.getName()); mFileLengthTextView.setText(String.format("%02d:%02d", minutes,seconds)); builder.setView(view); // request a window without the title dialog.getWindow().requestFeature(Window.FEATURE_NO_TITLE); return builder.create();} ÂΩìÁÇπÂáªÊí≠ÊîæÂΩïÈü≥ÁöÑÊåâÈíÆ‰πãÂêéÔºå‰ºöË∞ÉÁî® onPlay() ÊñπÊ≥ïÔºåÁÑ∂ÂêéÊ†πÊçÆ isPlayingÔºàÊ†áËØÜÂΩìÂâçÊòØÂê¶Êí≠ÊîæÂΩïÈü≥ÔºâÁöÑÂÄºÔºåÊù•Ë∞ÉÁî®‰∏çÂêåÁöÑÊñπÊ≥ï„ÄÇ 12345678910111213private void onPlay(boolean isPlaying){ if (!isPlaying) { //currently MediaPlayer is not playing audio if(mMediaPlayer == null) { startPlaying(); //start from beginning } else { resumePlaying(); //resume the currently paused MediaPlayer } } else { pausePlaying(); }} Êàë‰ª¨ÊúÄÂÖ≥ÂøÉÁöÑÔºåËé´Ëøá‰∫é startPlaying() Ëøô‰∏™ÊñπÊ≥ïÔºåËøô‰∏™ÊñπÊ≥ï‰æøÊòØÊù•ÂºÄÂêØÊí≠ÊîæÂΩïÈü≥ÁöÑÔºåÊàë‰ª¨È¶ñÂÖàÂ∞ÜÂ§ñÈÉ®‰º†ÂÖ•ÁöÑÊúâÂÖ≥ÁöÑÂΩïÈü≥‰ø°ÊÅØÔºåËÆæÁΩÆÁªô MediaPlayerÔºåÁÑ∂ÂêéÂºÄÂßãË∞ÉÁî® mMediaPlayer.start() ËøõË°åÂΩïÈü≥ÁöÑÊí≠ÊîæÔºåÁÑ∂ÂêéË∞ÉÁî® updateSeekbar() ÂÆûÊó∂Êõ¥Êñ∞ËøõÂ∫¶Êù°ÁöÑÂÜÖÂÆπ„ÄÇÂΩì MediaPlayer ÁöÑÂÜÖÂÆπÊí≠ÊîæÂÆåÊàêÂêéÔºåË∞ÉÁî® stopPlaying() ÊñπÊ≥ïÔºåÂÖ≥Èó≠ mMediaPlayer„ÄÇ 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031private void startPlaying() { mPlayButton.setImageResource(R.drawable.ic_media_pause); mMediaPlayer = new MediaPlayer(); try { mMediaPlayer.setDataSource(item.getFilePath()); mMediaPlayer.prepare(); mSeekBar.setMax(mMediaPlayer.getDuration()); mMediaPlayer.setOnPreparedListener(new MediaPlayer.OnPreparedListener() { @Override public void onPrepared(MediaPlayer mp) { mMediaPlayer.start(); } }); } catch (IOException e) { Log.e(LOG_TAG, "prepare() failed"); } mMediaPlayer.setOnCompletionListener(new MediaPlayer.OnCompletionListener() { @Override public void onCompletion(MediaPlayer mp) { stopPlaying(); } }); updateSeekBar(); //keep screen on while playing audio getActivity().getWindow().addFlags(WindowManager.LayoutParams.FLAG_KEEP_SCREEN_ON);} ‰ª•‰∏ä‰æøÊòØÊú¨ÊñáÁöÑÂÖ®ÈÉ®ÂÜÖÂÆπÔºåÊúâÂÖ≥ÁöÑ‰ª£Á†ÅÊàëÂ∑≤Áªè‰∏ä‰º†Âà∞ Github ‰∏ä‰∫ÜÔºåÈúÄË¶ÅÁöÑ ÁÇπÂáªËøôÈáåÔºåÂñúÊ¨¢ÁöÑËØùÔºåÊ¨¢ËøéÊù•Ê≥¢ star Âíå fork„ÄÇ

entry.title: Â©öÁ§ºÁ≠πÂ§á

entry.title: android UtilsÂ∑•ÂÖ∑Á±ªÊñπÊ≥ïÂ§ßÈõÜÂêà
entry.content: ** * Êèê‰æõÁ≤æÁ°ÆÁöÑÂ∞èÊï∞‰ΩçÂõõËàç‰∫îÂÖ•Â§ÑÁêÜÔºå‰øùÁïôÂá†‰ΩçÂ∞èÊï∞„ÄÇ * * @param v ÈúÄË¶ÅÂõõËàç‰∫îÂÖ•ÁöÑÊï∞Â≠ó * @param scale Â∞èÊï∞ÁÇπÂêé‰øùÁïôÂá†‰Ωç * @return ÂõõËàç‰∫îÂÖ•ÂêéÁöÑÁªìÊûú */ public static double round(double v, int scale) { if (scale < 0) { throw new IllegalArgumentException("The scale must be a positive integer or zero"); } BigDecimal b = new BigDecimal(Double.toString(v)); BigDecimal one = new BigDecimal("1"); double bb = b.divide(one, scale, BigDecimal.ROUND_HALF_UP).doubleValue(); return bb; } /** * Êèê‰æõÔºàÁõ∏ÂØπÔºâÁ≤æÁ°ÆÁöÑÈô§Ê≥ïËøêÁÆó„ÄÇÂΩìÂèëÁîüÈô§‰∏çÂ∞ΩÁöÑÊÉÖÂÜµÊó∂ÔºåÁî±scaleÂèÇÊï∞Êåá ÂÆöÁ≤æÂ∫¶Ôºå‰ª•ÂêéÁöÑÊï∞Â≠óÂõõËàç‰∫îÂÖ•„ÄÇ * * @param v1 Ë¢´Èô§Êï∞ * @param v2 Èô§Êï∞ * @param scale Ë°®Á§∫Ë°®Á§∫ÈúÄË¶ÅÁ≤æÁ°ÆÂà∞Â∞èÊï∞ÁÇπ‰ª•ÂêéÂá†‰Ωç„ÄÇ * @return ‰∏§‰∏™ÂèÇÊï∞ÁöÑÂïÜ */ public static double div(double v1, double v2, int scale) { if (scale < 0) { throw new IllegalArgumentException("The scale must be a positive integer or zero"); } BigDecimal b1 = new BigDecimal(Double.toString(v1)); BigDecimal b2 = new BigDecimal(Double.toString(v2)); return b1.divide(b2, scale, BigDecimal.ROUND_HALF_UP).doubleValue(); } /** * Êèê‰æõÁ≤æÁ°ÆÁöÑ‰πòÊ≥ïËøêÁÆó„ÄÇ * * @param v1 Ë¢´‰πòÊï∞ * @param v2 ‰πòÊï∞ * @return ‰∏§‰∏™ÂèÇÊï∞ÁöÑÁßØ */ public static double mul(double v1, double v2) { BigDecimal b1 = new BigDecimal(Double.toString(v1)); BigDecimal b2 = new BigDecimal(Double.toString(v2)); return b1.multiply(b2).doubleValue(); } /** * Ê£ÄÊü•ÊâãÊú∫‰∏äÊòØÂê¶ÂÆâË£Ö‰∫ÜÊåáÂÆöÁöÑËΩØ‰ª∂ * * @param context * @param packageName ÔºöÂ∫îÁî®ÂåÖÂêç * @return */ public static boolean isAvilible(Context context, String packageName) { // Ëé∑Âèñpackagemanager PackageManager packageManager = context.getPackageManager(); // Ëé∑ÂèñÊâÄÊúâÂ∑≤ÂÆâË£ÖÁ®ãÂ∫èÁöÑÂåÖ‰ø°ÊÅØ List<PackageInfo> packageInfos = packageManager.getInstalledPackages(0); // Áî®‰∫éÂ≠òÂÇ®ÊâÄÊúâÂ∑≤ÂÆâË£ÖÁ®ãÂ∫èÁöÑÂåÖÂêç List<String> packageNames = new ArrayList<String>(); // ‰ªépinfo‰∏≠Â∞ÜÂåÖÂêçÂ≠óÈÄê‰∏ÄÂèñÂá∫ÔºåÂéãÂÖ•pName list‰∏≠ if (packageInfos != null) { for (int i = 0; i < packageInfos.size(); i++) { String packName = packageInfos.get(i).packageName; packageNames.add(packName); } } // Âà§Êñ≠packageNames‰∏≠ÊòØÂê¶ÊúâÁõÆÊ†áÁ®ãÂ∫èÁöÑÂåÖÂêçÔºåÊúâTRUEÔºåÊ≤°ÊúâFALSE return packageNames.contains(packageName); } /** * Ê†πÊçÆ‰∏Ä‰∏™ÁΩëÁªúËøûÊé•(String)Ëé∑ÂèñbitmapÂõæÂÉè * * @param imageUri * @return */ public static Bitmap getbitmap(String imageUri) { Log.v("", "getbitmap:" + imageUri); // ÊòæÁ§∫ÁΩëÁªú‰∏äÁöÑÂõæÁâá Bitmap bitmap = null; try { URL myFileUrl = new URL(imageUri); HttpURLConnection conn = (HttpURLConnection) myFileUrl .openConnection(); conn.setDoInput(true); conn.connect(); InputStream is = conn.getInputStream(); bitmap = BitmapFactory.decodeStream(is); is.close(); Log.v("", "image download finished." + imageUri); } catch (OutOfMemoryError e) { e.printStackTrace(); bitmap = null; } catch (IOException e) { e.printStackTrace(); Log.v("", "getbitmap bmp fail---"); bitmap = null; } return bitmap; } /** * Â∞ÜÂ≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤ËΩ¨Êç¢ÊàêBitmapÁ±ªÂûã * * @param * @return */ public static Bitmap stringtoBitmap(String string) { Bitmap bitmap = null; try { byte[] bitmapArray; bitmapArray = Base64.decode(string, Base64.DEFAULT); bitmap = BitmapFactory.decodeByteArray(bitmapArray, 0, bitmapArray.length); } catch (Exception e) { e.printStackTrace(); } return bitmap; } /** * Â∞ÜBitmapËΩ¨Êç¢ÊàêÂ≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤ * * @param bitmap * @return */ public static String bitmaptoString(Bitmap bitmap) { String string = null; ByteArrayOutputStream bStream = new ByteArrayOutputStream(); bitmap.compress(Bitmap.CompressFormat.PNG, 100, bStream); byte[] bytes = bStream.toByteArray(); string = Base64.encodeToString(bytes, Base64.DEFAULT); return string; } /** * ËøîÂõûÂΩìÂâçÁ®ãÂ∫èÁâàÊú¨Âêç-V2 ‰∏âÊÆµ‰øÆÊîπ---ex 5.2---5.21 * support 7.8.8.1, 7.18.8.1, 17.18.8.1 modified by chenhong, 2018-5-25 */ public static String getAppVersionNameV2(Context context) { String versionCode = ""; try { PackageInfo pi = MyApp.getAppContext().getPackageManager().getPackageInfo(MyApp.getAppContext().getPackageName(), 0); versionCode = pi.versionName; } catch (Exception e) { e.printStackTrace(); } if (!TextUtils.isEmpty(versionCode)) { int firstDotIndex = versionCode.indexOf("."); if (firstDotIndex > -1) { String mainVersion = versionCode.substring(0, firstDotIndex); String subVersion = ""; if (versionCode.length() > firstDotIndex + 1) { subVersion = versionCode.substring(firstDotIndex + 1); subVersion = subVersion.replace(".", ""); } versionCode = mainVersion + "." + subVersion; int length = versionCode.length(); int dotIndex = versionCode.indexOf("."); if (dotIndex == length - 1) { versionCode += "00"; } else if (dotIndex == length - 2) { versionCode += "0"; } } else { versionCode += ".00"; } } return versionCode; } /** * Ëé∑ÂèñIPÂú∞ÂùÄ * * @param context * @return */ public static String getIPAddress(Context context) { NetworkInfo info = ((ConnectivityManager) context.getSystemService(Context.CONNECTIVITY_SERVICE)).getActiveNetworkInfo(); if (info != null && info.isConnected()) { if (info.getType() == ConnectivityManager.TYPE_MOBILE) {//ÂΩìÂâç‰ΩøÁî®2G/3G/4GÁΩëÁªú try { //Enumeration<NetworkInterface> en=NetworkInterface.getNetworkInterfaces(); for (Enumeration<NetworkInterface> en = NetworkInterface.getNetworkInterfaces(); en.hasMoreElements(); ) { NetworkInterface intf = en.nextElement(); for (Enumeration<InetAddress> enumIpAddr = intf.getInetAddresses(); enumIpAddr.hasMoreElements(); ) { InetAddress inetAddress = enumIpAddr.nextElement(); if (!inetAddress.isLoopbackAddress() && inetAddress instanceof Inet4Address) { return inetAddress.getHostAddress(); } } } } catch (SocketException e) { e.printStackTrace(); } } else if (info.getType() == ConnectivityManager.TYPE_WIFI) {//ÂΩìÂâç‰ΩøÁî®Êó†Á∫øÁΩëÁªú WifiManager wifiManager = (WifiManager) context.getSystemService(Context.WIFI_SERVICE); WifiInfo wifiInfo = wifiManager.getConnectionInfo(); String ipAddress = intIP2StringIP(wifiInfo.getIpAddress());//ÂæóÂà∞IPV4Âú∞ÂùÄ return ipAddress; } } else { //ÂΩìÂâçÊó†ÁΩëÁªúËøûÊé•,ËØ∑Âú®ËÆæÁΩÆ‰∏≠ÊâìÂºÄÁΩëÁªú } return null; } /** * Â∞ÜÂæóÂà∞ÁöÑintÁ±ªÂûãÁöÑIPËΩ¨Êç¢‰∏∫StringÁ±ªÂûã * * @param ip * @return */ public static String intIP2StringIP(int ip) { return (ip & 0xFF) + "." + ((ip >> 8) & 0xFF) + "." + ((ip >> 16) & 0xFF) + "." + (ip >> 24 & 0xFF); } /** * Ëé∑ÂèñÂ±èÂπïÈ´òÂ∫¶ * * @param context * @return */ public static int getWindowHeight(Context context) { WindowManager wm = (WindowManager) context.getSystemService(Context.WINDOW_SERVICE); int windowHeight = wm.getDefaultDisplay().getHeight(); return windowHeight; } /** * Ëé∑ÂèñÂ±èÂπïÂÆΩÂ∫¶ * * @param context * @return */ public static int getWindowWidth(Context context) { WindowManager wm = (WindowManager) context.getSystemService(Context.WINDOW_SERVICE); int windowWidth = wm.getDefaultDisplay().getWidth(); return windowWidth; } /** * jsonÂ≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤ËΩ¨map * * @param jsonString * @return */ public static Map transStringToMap(String jsonString) { Gson gson = new Gson(); Map<String, Object> map = new HashMap<String, Object>(); map = gson.fromJson(jsonString, map.getClass()); return map; } /** * ËÆ°ÁÆó‰∏§‰∏™Êó∂Èó¥Áõ∏ÈöîÂ§öÂ∞ëÂ§© * * @return */ public static String getDayNumberStr(String nowDate, String createDate) { String str = ""; int strDay = 0; DateFormat df = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd"); try { Date d1 = df.parse(nowDate); Date d2 = df.parse(createDate); long diff = d1.getTime() - d2.getTime();//ËøôÊ†∑ÂæóÂà∞ÁöÑÂ∑ÆÂÄºÊòØÂæÆÁßíÁ∫ßÂà´ long days = diff / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24); long hours = (diff - days * (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24)) / (1000 * 60 * 60); long minutes = (diff - days * (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24) - hours * (1000 * 60 * 60)) / (1000 * 60);// System.out.println("" + days + "Â§©" + hours + "Â∞èÊó∂" + minutes + "ÂàÜ"); str = days + ""; strDay = Integer.parseInt(str) + 1; } catch (Exception e) { e.printStackTrace(); } return strDay + ""; } /** * Ëé∑ÂæóÂΩìÂ§©0ÁÇπÊó∂Èó¥ */ public static int getTimesmorning() { Calendar cal = Calendar.getInstance(); cal.set(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY, 0); cal.set(Calendar.SECOND, 0); cal.set(Calendar.MINUTE, 0); cal.set(Calendar.MILLISECOND, 0); return (int) (cal.getTimeInMillis() / 1000); } /** * Ëé∑ÂæóÂΩìÂ§©24ÁÇπÊó∂Èó¥ */ public static int getTimesnight() { Calendar cal = Calendar.getInstance(); cal.set(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY, 24); cal.set(Calendar.SECOND, 0); cal.set(Calendar.MINUTE, 0); cal.set(Calendar.MILLISECOND, 0); return (int) (cal.getTimeInMillis() / 1000); } /** * Ëé∑ÂæóÂΩìÂ§©Êó∂Èó¥ */ public static String getTodayDate() { SimpleDateFormat df = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd");//ËÆæÁΩÆÊó•ÊúüÊ†ºÂºè String date = df.format(new Date());// new Date()‰∏∫Ëé∑ÂèñÂΩìÂâçÁ≥ªÁªüÊó∂Èó¥ return date; } /** * Âà§Êñ≠ÂΩìÂâçÊó∂Èó¥ÊòØÂê¶Âú®Êó∂Èó¥date‰πãÂâç date1 7ÁÇπ date2 8ÁÇπ * Êó∂Èó¥Ê†ºÂºè 2005-4-21 16:16:34 "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss" * * @param date * @return * @throws ParseException */ public static boolean isDateBefore(String date) throws ParseException { Date date1 = new Date();//ÂΩìÂâçÊó∂Èó¥ DateFormat df = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss"); return date1.before(df.parse(date)); } /** * Âà§Êñ≠ÂΩìÂâçÊó∂Èó¥ÊòØÂê¶Âú®Êó∂Èó¥date‰πãÂêé date1 8ÁÇπ date2 5ÁÇπ * * @param date * @return * @throws ParseException */ public static boolean isDateAfter(String date) throws ParseException { Date date1 = new Date();//ÂΩìÂâçÊó∂Èó¥ DateFormat df = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss"); return (df.parse(date)).before(date1); } /** * Â§ßÂ∞èÂÜôËΩ¨Êç¢ * * @param UpperCasestr * @return * @throws Exception */ public static String toUpperCase(String UpperCasestr) throws Exception { return UpperCasestr.toUpperCase().toString(); } /** * ÂéªÈô§Â≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤Á©∫Ê†º * * @return */ public static String removeAllSpace(String str) { String tmpstr = str.replace(" ", ""); return tmpstr; } /** * Ëé∑ÂèñÂΩìÂâçÁΩëÁªúÁ±ªÂûã * * @return */ public static String getNetworkTypeAll() { String strNetworkType = ""; ConnectivityManager cm = (ConnectivityManager) MyApp.mContext.getSystemService(Context.CONNECTIVITY_SERVICE); NetworkInfo networkInfo = cm.getActiveNetworkInfo(); if (networkInfo != null && networkInfo.isConnected()) { if (networkInfo.getType() == ConnectivityManager.TYPE_WIFI) { strNetworkType = "WIFI"; } else if (networkInfo.getType() == ConnectivityManager.TYPE_MOBILE) { String _strSubTypeName = networkInfo.getSubtypeName(); // TD-SCDMA networkType is 17 int networkType = networkInfo.getSubtype(); switch (networkType) { case TelephonyManager.NETWORK_TYPE_GPRS: case TelephonyManager.NETWORK_TYPE_EDGE: case TelephonyManager.NETWORK_TYPE_CDMA: case TelephonyManager.NETWORK_TYPE_1xRTT: case TelephonyManager.NETWORK_TYPE_IDEN: //api<8 : replace by 11 strNetworkType = "2G"; break; case TelephonyManager.NETWORK_TYPE_UMTS: case TelephonyManager.NETWORK_TYPE_EVDO_0: case TelephonyManager.NETWORK_TYPE_EVDO_A: case TelephonyManager.NETWORK_TYPE_HSDPA: case TelephonyManager.NETWORK_TYPE_HSUPA: case TelephonyManager.NETWORK_TYPE_HSPA: case TelephonyManager.NETWORK_TYPE_EVDO_B: //api<9 : replace by 14 case TelephonyManager.NETWORK_TYPE_EHRPD: //api<11 : replace by 12 case TelephonyManager.NETWORK_TYPE_HSPAP: //api<13 : replace by 15 strNetworkType = "3G"; break; case TelephonyManager.NETWORK_TYPE_LTE: //api<11 : replace by 13 strNetworkType = "4G"; break; default: if (_strSubTypeName.equalsIgnoreCase("TD-SCDMA") || _strSubTypeName.equalsIgnoreCase("WCDMA") || _strSubTypeName.equalsIgnoreCase("CDMA2000")) { strNetworkType = "3G"; } else { strNetworkType = _strSubTypeName; } break; } } } return strNetworkType; } /** * Ëé∑ÂèñsimÂç°ËøêËê•ÂïÜ‰ø°ÊÅØ */ public static String getSimOperator() { String operator = ""; try { TelephonyManager telManager = (TelephonyManager) MyApp.mContext.getSystemService(Context.TELEPHONY_SERVICE); operator = telManager.getSimOperator(); if (operator != null) { if (operator.equals("46000") || operator.equals("46002") || operator.equals("46007")) { operator = "‰∏≠ÂõΩÁßªÂä®"; } else if (operator.equals("46001")) { operator = "‰∏≠ÂõΩËÅîÈÄö"; } else if (operator.equals("46003")) { operator = "‰∏≠ÂõΩÁîµ‰ø°"; } } } catch (Exception e) { e.printStackTrace(); return operator; } return operator; } /** * Âº∫Âà∂ÈöêËóèËæìÂÖ•Ê≥ïÈîÆÁõò * * @param context Context * @param view EditText */ public void hideInput(Context context, View view) { InputMethodManager inputMethodManager = (InputMethodManager) context.getSystemService(Context.INPUT_METHOD_SERVICE); inputMethodManager.hideSoftInputFromWindow(view.getWindowToken(), 0); }

webView.getSettings().setJavaScriptEnabled(true); 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758public class WebviewUtil { public static void setWebCookie(Context context) { CookieManager.setAcceptFileSchemeCookies(true); cookieManager.setCookie(url, s1); if (Build.VERSION.SDK_INT >= Build.VERSION_CODES.LOLLIPOP_MR1) { CookieManager.getInstance().flush(); } else { CookieSyncManager.getInstance().sync(); } } private static String getUserId() { return AccountManager.getInstance().getAccount().id; native code cannot use Java StreamsorpdfView.fromSource(DocumentSource)orpdfView.fromAsset(String) .pages(0, 2, 1, 3, 3, 3) // all pages are displayed by default .enableSwipe(true) // allows to block changing pages using swipe .swipeHorizontal(false) .enableDoubletap(true) .defaultPage(0) // allows to draw something on the current page, usually visible in the middle of the screen .onDraw(onDrawListener) // allows to draw something on all pages, separately for every page. Called only for visible pages .onDrawAll(onDrawListener) .onLoad(onLoadCompleteListener) // called after document is loaded and starts to be rendered .onPageChange(onPageChangeListener) .onPageScroll(onPageScrollListener) .onError(onErrorListener) .onPageError(onPageErrorListener) .onRender(onRenderListener) // called after document is rendered for the first time // called on single tap, return true if handled, false to toggle scroll handle visibility .onTap(onTapListener) .onLongPress(onLongPressListener) .enableAnnotationRendering(false) // render annotations (such as comments, colors or forms) .password(null) .scrollHandle(null) .enableAntialiasing(true) // improve rendering a little bit on low-res screens // spacing between pages in dp. To define spacing color, set view background .spacing(0) .autoSpacing(false) // add dynamic spacing to fit each page on its own on the screen .linkHandler(DefaultLinkHandler) .pageFitPolicy(FitPolicy.WIDTH) .pageSnap(true) // snap pages to screen boundaries .pageFling(false) // make a fling change only a single page like ViewPager .nightMode(false) // toggle night mode entry.content: LottieÊòØ‰∏Ä‰∏™ÊîØÊåÅAndroid„ÄÅiOS„ÄÅReact NativeÔºåÂπ∂Áî± Adobe After EffectsÂà∂‰ΩúaepÊ†ºÂºèÁöÑÂä®ÁîªÔºåÁÑ∂ÂêéÁªèÁî±bodymovinÊèí‰ª∂ËΩ¨ÂåñÊ∏≤Êüì‰∏∫jsonÊ†ºÂºèÂèØË¢´ÁßªÂä®Á´ØÊú¨Âú∞ËØÜÂà´Ëß£ÊûêÁöÑAirbnbÂºÄÊ∫êÂ∫ì„ÄÇLottieÂÆûÊó∂ÂëàÁé∞After EffectsÂä®ÁîªÊïàÊûúÔºåËÆ©Â∫îÁî®Á®ãÂ∫èÂèØ‰ª•ÂÉè‰ΩøÁî®ÈùôÊÄÅÂõæÁâá‰∏ÄÊ†∑ËΩªÊùæÂú∞‰ΩøÁî®Âä®Áîª„ÄÇLottieÊîØÊåÅAPI 14Âèä‰ª•‰∏ä„ÄÇ ‰∏Ä„ÄÅÈ¢ÑËßà ‰∫å „ÄÅÂü∫Êú¨‰ΩøÁî® Âú®Ëá™Â∑±È°πÁõÆmoduleÁöÑbuild.gradleÊñá‰ª∂‰∏≠Ê∑ªÂä†Â¶Ç‰∏ã‰ª£Á†ÅÔºö 123dependencies { compile 'com.airbnb.android:lottie:2.0.0-beta4'} LottieAnimationView‰ΩøÁî®ÊúÄÁÆÄÂçïÁöÑÊñπÊ≥ïÊòØ: 1234567<com.airbnb.lottie.LottieAnimationView android:id="@+id/animation_view" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:lottie_fileName="hello-world.json" app:lottie_loop="true" app:lottie_autoPlay="true" /> ÂÖ∂‰∏≠lottie_loopÂ±ûÊÄß‰∏∫ÊòØÂê¶ÈáçÂ§çÊó†ÈôêÊúüÂä®ÁîªÔºåÂΩì‰∏∫trueÊó∂ÔºåÂä®ÁîªÊó†ÈôêÊ¨°Êï∞Êí≠ÊîæÔºå‰∏∫falseÊó∂ÔºåÊí≠Êîæ‰∏ÄÊ¨°„ÄÇ ÊàñËÄÖÊääjsonËµÑÊ∫êÊîæÂú®app/src/main/assets‰∏ãÔºå‰πüÂèØ‰ª•ËøôÊ†∑‰ΩøÁî®ÂÆÉ: 1234LottieAnimationView animationView = (LottieAnimationView) findViewById(R.id.animation_view);animationView.setAnimation("hello-world.json");animationView.loop(true);animationView.playAnimation(); ËØ•ÊñπÊ≥ïÂ∞ÜÂä†ËΩΩÊñá‰ª∂Âπ∂Âú®ÂêéÂè∞Ëß£ÊûêÂä®ÁîªÔºåÂú®ÂÆåÊàêÂêéÂºÇÊ≠•ÂºÄÂßãÂëàÁé∞„ÄÇ Â¶ÇÊûúÊÇ®Â∏åÊúõÈáçÁî®‰∏Ä‰∏™Âä®ÁîªÔºå‰æãÂ¶ÇÂú®ÂàóË°®ÁöÑÊØè‰∏™È°πÁõÆ‰∏≠ÔºåÊàñËÄÖ‰ªé‰∏Ä‰∏™ÁΩëÁªúËØ∑Ê±ÇJSONObject‰∏≠Âä†ËΩΩÂÆÉ: 123456789LottieAnimationView animationView = (LottieAnimationView) findViewById(R.id.animation_view);...Cancellable compositionCancellable = LottieComposition.Factory.fromJson(getResources(), jsonObject, (composition) -> { animationView.setComposition(composition); animationView.playAnimation();});// ÂèñÊ∂àÂºÇÊ≠•Âä†ËΩΩ// compositionCancellable.cancel(); ‰Ω†‰πüÂèØ‰ª•ÊéßÂà∂Âä®ÁîªÊ∑ªÂä†ÁõëÂê¨Ôºö 1234567891011121314151617181920animationView.addAnimatorUpdateListener((animation) -> { // Do something.});animationView.playAnimation();...if (animationView.isAnimating()) { // Do something.}...animationView.setProgress(0.5f);...// Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâÂä®ÁîªÈÄüÂ∫¶ÂíåÊó∂ÈïøValueAnimator animator = ValueAnimator.ofFloat(0f, 1f) .setDuration(500);animator.addUpdateListener(animation -> { animationView.setProgress(animation.getAnimatedValue());});animator.start();...animationView.cancelAnimation(); ‰Ω†ÂèØ‰ª•ÁªôÊï¥‰∏™Âä®ÁîªÔºå‰∏Ä‰∏™ÁâπÂÆöÁöÑÂõæÂ±ÇÔºåÊàñËÄÖ‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂõæÂ±ÇÁöÑÁâπÂÆöÂÜÖÂÆπÊ∑ªÂä†‰∏Ä‰∏™È¢úËâ≤ËøáÊª§Âô®„ÄÇ 1234567891011121314// ‰ªª‰ΩïÁ¨¶ÂêàÈ¢úËâ≤ËøáÊª§ÁïåÈù¢ÁöÑÁ±ªfinal PorterDuffColorFilter colorFilter = new PorterDuffColorFilter(Color.RED, PorterDuff.Mode.LIGHTEN);// Âú®Êï¥‰∏™ËßÜÂõæ‰∏≠Ê∑ªÂä†‰∏Ä‰∏™È¢úËâ≤ËøáÊª§Âô®animationView.addColorFilter(colorFilter);//Âú®ÁâπÂÆöÁöÑÂõæÂ±Ç‰∏≠Ê∑ªÂä†‰∏Ä‰∏™È¢úËâ≤Êª§ÈïúanimationView.addColorFilterToLayer("hello_layer", colorFilter);// Ê∑ªÂä†‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂΩ©Ëâ≤ËøáÊª§Âô®ÁâπÊïà‚Äúhello_layer‚Äù‰∏äÁöÑÂÜÖÂÆπanimationView.addColorFilterToContent("hello_layer", "hello", colorFilter);// Ê∏ÖÈô§ÊâÄÊúâÁöÑÈ¢úËâ≤Êª§ÈïúanimationView.clearColorFilters(); Ê≥®ÊÑè:È¢úËâ≤ËøáÊª§Âô®Âè™ÈÄÇÁî®‰∫éÂõæÂ±ÇÔºåÂ¶ÇÂõæÂÉèÂ±ÇÂíåÂÆûÂ±ÇÔºå‰ª•ÂèäÂåÖÂê´Â°´ÂÖÖ„ÄÅÊèèËæπÊàñÁªÑÂÜÖÂÆπÁöÑÂÜÖÂÆπ„ÄÇ Âú®ÂºïÊìéÁõñ‰∏ã,LottieAnimationView‰ΩøÁî®LottieDrawableÂëàÁé∞ÂÖ∂Âä®Áîª„ÄÇÂ¶ÇÊûúÈúÄË¶ÅÔºåÊÇ®ÂèØ‰ª•Áõ¥Êé•‰ΩøÁî®ÂèØÁªòÂà∂ÁöÑË°®Âçï: 1234LottieDrawable drawable = new LottieDrawable();LottieComposition.Factory.fromAssetFileName(getContext(), "hello-world.json", (composition) -> { drawable.setComposition(composition);}); Â¶ÇÊûú‰Ω†ÁöÑÂä®Áîª‰ºöÁªèÂ∏∏ÈáçÁî®,LottieAnimationViewÂÜÖÁΩÆ‰∫Ü‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂèØÈÄâÁöÑÁºìÂ≠òÁ≠ñÁï•„ÄÇ‰ΩøÁî®LottieAnimationView .setAnimation(String,CacheStrategy)„ÄÇCacheStrategyÂèØ‰ª•Strong, Weak, ÊàñËÄÖNone„ÄÇLottieAnimationViewÂØπÂä†ËΩΩÂíåËß£ÊûêÁöÑÂä®ÁîªÊåÅÊúâÂº∫ÊàñÂº±ÁöÑÂèÇËÄÉ„ÄÇÂº±ÊàñÂº∫Ë°®Á§∫ÁºìÂ≠ò‰∏≠ÁªÑÂêàÁöÑGCÂèÇËÄÉÂº∫Â∫¶„ÄÇ ‰∏â„ÄÅImage ÊîØÊåÅÂ¶ÇÊûúÊÇ®ÁöÑÂä®ÁîªÊòØ‰ªéassets‰∏≠Âä†ËΩΩÁöÑÔºåÂπ∂‰∏îÊÇ®ÁöÑÂõæÂÉèÊñá‰ª∂‰Ωç‰∫éassets ÁöÑÂ≠êÁõÆÂΩï‰∏≠ÔºåÈÇ£‰πàÊÇ®ÂèØ‰ª•ÂØπÂõæÂÉèËøõË°åÂä®Áîª„ÄÇ‰Ω†ÂèØ‰ª•Áî®LottieAnimationViewÊàñËÄÖLottieDrawableÂØπË±°Ë∞ÉÁî®setImageAssetsFolder(String)ÊñπÊ≥ïÔºåÊòéÁ°ÆassetsÁõ∏ÂØπÊñá‰ª∂Â§πÂÜÖÁöÑË∑ØÂæÑ,Á°Æ‰øùÂõæÂÉèbodymovinÂá∫Âè£‰∏é‰ªñ‰ª¨ÁöÑÂêçÂ≠ó‰∏çÂèò,Êñá‰ª∂Â§πÂ∫îËØ•img_ ÂºÄÂ§¥„ÄÇÂ¶ÇÊûúÁõ¥Êé•‰ΩøÁî®LottieDrawable,ÂΩì‰Ω†ÂÆåÊàêÊó∂ÊÇ®ÂøÖÈ°ªË∞ÉÁî®recycleBitmaps„ÄÇ Â¶ÇÊûú‰Ω†ÈúÄË¶ÅÊèê‰æõ‰Ω†Ëá™Â∑±ÁöÑ‰ΩçÂõæÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûú‰Ω†‰ªéÁΩëÁªúÊàñÂÖ∂‰ªñÂú∞Êñπ‰∏ãËΩΩÔºå‰Ω†ÂèØ‰ª•Êèê‰æõ‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂßîÊâòÊù•ÂÅöËøô‰∏™: 12345animationView.setImageAssetDelegate(new ImageAssetDelegate() { @Override public Bitmap fetchBitmap(LottieImageAsset asset) { getBitmap(asset); } }); Âõõ„ÄÅÊÄßËÉΩÂíåÂÜÖÂ≠òÂ¶ÇÊûúËØ•ÁªÑÂêàÊ≤°ÊúâÈÅÆÁΩ©ÊàñmattesÔºåÈÇ£‰πàÊÄßËÉΩÂíåÂÜÖÂ≠òÂºÄÈîÄÂ∫îËØ•Áõ∏ÂΩì‰∏çÈîô„ÄÇÊ≤°ÊúâÂàõÂª∫‰ªª‰Ωï‰ΩçÂõæÔºåÂ§ßÂ§öÊï∞Êìç‰ΩúÈÉΩÊòØÁÆÄÂçïÁöÑÁîªÂ∏ÉÁªòÂà∂Êìç‰Ωú„ÄÇÂ¶ÇÊûúËøô‰∏™ÁªÑÂêàÊúâÈÅÆÁΩ©ÊàñmattesÔºåÂ∞±‰ºö‰ΩøÁî®Â±èÂπïÂ§ñÁöÑÁºìÂÜ≤Âå∫ÔºåÂπ∂‰∏î‰ºöÊúâ‰∏Ä‰∏™ÊÄßËÉΩÊâìÂáª„ÄÇ Â¶ÇÊûúÂú®‰Ω†ÁöÑÂä®ÁîªÂàóË°®‰∏≠‰ΩøÁî®,Êé®Ëçê‰ΩøÁî®CacheStrategyÔºåÂú®Ë∞ÉÁî®LottieAnimationView.setAnimation(String, CacheStrategy)ÁöÑÊó∂ÂÄôÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•Âä®Áîª‰∏çÈúÄË¶ÅÊØèÊ¨°ÈÉΩÂèçÂ∫èÂàóÂåñ„ÄÇ ‰∫î„ÄÅLottieÂÆòÊñπDemo‰∏ãËΩΩhttps://fir.im/lottiedemo ÂÖ≠„ÄÅÂèÇËÄÉËµÑÊñôhttp://airbnb.design/lottie/ http://www.lottiefiles.com/ https://github.com/airbnb/lottie-android http://www.adobe.com/cn/products/aftereffects.html https://github.com/bodymovin/bodymovin https://github.com/airbnb/lottie-react-native https://github.com/airbnb/lottie-ios https://github.com/airbnb

entry.content: ÂíåMVCÊ°ÜÊû∂Ê®°Âºè‰∏ÄÊ†∑ÔºåModelÊ®°ÂûãÂ§ÑÁêÜÊï∞ÊçÆ‰ª£Á†Å‰∏çÂèòÂú®AndroidÁöÑAppÂºÄÂèë‰∏≠ÔºåÂæàÂ§ö‰∫∫ÁªèÂ∏∏‰ºöÂ§¥Áñº‰∫éAppÁöÑÊû∂ÊûÑÂ¶Ç‰ΩïËÆæËÆ°Ôºö ÊàëÁöÑAppÈúÄË¶ÅÂ∫îÁî®Ëøô‰∫õËÆæËÆ°Êû∂ÊûÑÂêóÔºü MVC,MVPÁ≠âÊû∂ÊûÑËÆ≤ÁöÑÊòØ‰ªÄ‰πàÔºüÂå∫Âà´ÊòØ‰ªÄ‰πàÔºü Êú¨ÊñáÂ∞±Êù•Â∏¶‰Ω†ÂàÜÊûê‰∏Ä‰∏ãËøôÂá†‰∏™Êû∂ÊûÑÁöÑÁâπÊÄßÔºå‰ºòÁº∫ÁÇπÔºå‰ª•ÂèäAppÊû∂ÊûÑËÆæËÆ°‰∏≠Â∫îËØ•Ê≥®ÊÑèÁöÑÈóÆÈ¢ò„ÄÇ 1.Êû∂ÊûÑËÆæËÆ°ÁöÑÁõÆÁöÑÈÄöËøáËÆæËÆ°‰ΩøÁ®ãÂ∫èÊ®°ÂùóÂåñÔºåÂÅöÂà∞Ê®°ÂùóÂÜÖÈÉ®ÁöÑÈ´òËÅöÂêàÂíåÊ®°Âùó‰πãÈó¥ÁöÑ‰ΩéËÄ¶Âêà„ÄÇËøôÊ†∑ÂÅöÁöÑÂ•ΩÂ§ÑÊòØ‰ΩøÂæóÁ®ãÂ∫èÂú®ÂºÄÂèëÁöÑËøáÁ®ã‰∏≠ÔºåÂºÄÂèë‰∫∫ÂëòÂè™ÈúÄË¶Å‰∏ìÊ≥®‰∫é‰∏ÄÁÇπÔºåÊèêÈ´òÁ®ãÂ∫èÂºÄÂèëÁöÑÊïàÁéáÔºåÂπ∂‰∏îÊõ¥ÂÆπÊòìËøõË°åÂêéÁª≠ÁöÑÊµãËØï‰ª•ÂèäÂÆö‰ΩçÈóÆÈ¢ò„ÄÇ‰ΩÜËÆæËÆ°‰∏çËÉΩËøùËÉåÁõÆÁöÑÔºåÂØπ‰∫é‰∏çÂêåÈáèÁ∫ßÁöÑÂ∑•Á®ãÔºåÂÖ∑‰ΩìÊû∂ÊûÑÁöÑÂÆûÁé∞ÊñπÂºèÂøÖÁÑ∂ÊòØ‰∏çÂêåÁöÑÔºåÂàáÂøåÁäØ‰∏∫‰∫ÜËÆæËÆ°ËÄåËÆæËÆ°Ôºå‰∏∫‰∫ÜÊû∂ÊûÑËÄåÊû∂ÊûÑÁöÑÊØõÁóÖ„ÄÇ ‰∏æ‰∏™ÁÆÄÂçïÁöÑ‰æãÂ≠êÔºö ‰∏Ä‰∏™Android AppÂ¶ÇÊûúÂè™Êúâ3‰∏™JavaÊñá‰ª∂ÔºåÈÇ£Âè™ÈúÄË¶ÅÂÅöÁÇπÊ®°ÂùóÂíåÂ±ÇÊ¨°ÁöÑÂàíÂàÜÂ∞±ÂèØ‰ª•ÔºåÂºïÂÖ•Ê°ÜÊû∂ÊàñËÄÖÊû∂ÊûÑÂèçËÄåÊèêÈ´ò‰∫ÜÂ∑•‰ΩúÈáèÔºåÈôç‰Ωé‰∫ÜÁîü‰∫ßÂäõÔºõ ‰ΩÜÂ¶ÇÊûúÂΩìÂâçÂºÄÂèëÁöÑAppÊúÄÁªà‰ª£Á†ÅÈáèÂú®10WË°å‰ª•‰∏äÔºåÊú¨Âú∞ÈúÄË¶ÅËøõË°åÂ§çÊùÇÊìç‰ΩúÔºåÂêåÊó∂‰πüÈúÄË¶ÅËÄÉËôëÂà∞‰∏éÂÖ∂‰ΩôÁöÑAndroidÂºÄÂèëËÄÖ‰ª•ÂèäÂêéÂè∞ÂºÄÂèë‰∫∫Âëò‰πãÈó¥ÁöÑÂêåÊ≠•ÈÖçÂêàÔºåÈÇ£Â∞±ÈúÄË¶ÅÂú®Êû∂ÊûÑ‰∏äËøõË°å‰∏Ä‰∫õÊÄùËÄÉÔºÅ 2.MVCËÆæËÆ°Êû∂ÊûÑ MVCÁÆÄ‰ªãMVCÂÖ®ÂêçÊòØModel View ControllerÔºåÂ¶ÇÂõæÔºåÊòØÊ®°Âûã(model)ÔºçËßÜÂõæ(view)ÔºçÊéßÂà∂Âô®(controller)ÁöÑÁº©ÂÜôÔºå‰∏ÄÁßçËΩØ‰ª∂ËÆæËÆ°ÂÖ∏ËåÉÔºåÁî®‰∏ÄÁßç‰∏öÂä°ÈÄªËæë„ÄÅÊï∞ÊçÆ„ÄÅÁïåÈù¢ÊòæÁ§∫ÂàÜÁ¶ªÁöÑÊñπÊ≥ïÁªÑÁªá‰ª£Á†ÅÔºåÂú®ÊîπËøõÂíå‰∏™ÊÄßÂåñÂÆöÂà∂ÁïåÈù¢ÂèäÁî®Êà∑‰∫§‰∫íÁöÑÂêåÊó∂Ôºå‰∏çÈúÄË¶ÅÈáçÊñ∞ÁºñÂÜô‰∏öÂä°ÈÄªËæë„ÄÇ ÂÖ∂‰∏≠MÂ±ÇÂ§ÑÁêÜÊï∞ÊçÆÔºå‰∏öÂä°ÈÄªËæëÁ≠âÔºõVÂ±ÇÂ§ÑÁêÜÁïåÈù¢ÁöÑÊòæÁ§∫ÁªìÊûúÔºõCÂ±ÇËµ∑Âà∞Ê°•Ê¢ÅÁöÑ‰ΩúÁî®ÔºåÊù•ÊéßÂà∂VÂ±ÇÂíåMÂ±ÇÈÄö‰ø°‰ª•Ê≠§Êù•ËææÂà∞ÂàÜÁ¶ªËßÜÂõæÊòæÁ§∫Âíå‰∏öÂä°ÈÄªËæëÂ±Ç„ÄÇ Android‰∏≠ÁöÑMVCAndroid‰∏≠ÁïåÈù¢ÈÉ®ÂàÜ‰πüÈááÁî®‰∫ÜÂΩìÂâçÊØîËæÉÊµÅË°åÁöÑMVCÊ°ÜÊû∂ÔºåÂú®Android‰∏≠Ôºö ËßÜÂõæÂ±Ç(View) ‰∏ÄËà¨ÈááÁî®XMLÊñá‰ª∂ËøõË°åÁïåÈù¢ÁöÑÊèèËø∞ÔºåËøô‰∫õXMLÂèØ‰ª•ÁêÜËß£‰∏∫AndroidAppÁöÑView„ÄÇ‰ΩøÁî®ÁöÑÊó∂ÂÄôÂèØ‰ª•ÈùûÂ∏∏Êñπ‰æøÁöÑÂºïÂÖ•„ÄÇÂêåÊó∂‰æø‰∫éÂêéÊúüÁïåÈù¢ÁöÑ‰øÆÊîπ„ÄÇÈÄªËæë‰∏≠‰∏éÁïåÈù¢ÂØπÂ∫îÁöÑid‰∏çÂèòÂåñÂàô‰ª£Á†Å‰∏çÁî®‰øÆÊîπÔºåÂ§ßÂ§ßÂ¢ûÂº∫‰∫Ü‰ª£Á†ÅÁöÑÂèØÁª¥Êä§ÊÄß„ÄÇ ÊéßÂà∂Â±Ç(Controller) AndroidÁöÑÊéßÂà∂Â±ÇÁöÑÈáç‰ªªÈÄöÂ∏∏ËêΩÂú®‰∫Ü‰ºóÂ§öÁöÑActivityÁöÑËÇ©‰∏ä„ÄÇËøôÂè•ËØù‰πüÂ∞±ÊöóÂê´‰∫Ü‰∏çË¶ÅÂú®Activity‰∏≠ÂÜô‰ª£Á†ÅÔºåË¶ÅÈÄöËøáActivity‰∫§Ââ≤Model‰∏öÂä°ÈÄªËæëÂ±ÇÂ§ÑÁêÜÔºåËøôÊ†∑ÂÅöÁöÑÂè¶Â§ñ‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂéüÂõ†ÊòØAndroid‰∏≠ÁöÑActiivityÁöÑÂìçÂ∫îÊó∂Èó¥ÊòØ5sÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûúËÄóÊó∂ÁöÑÊìç‰ΩúÊîæÂú®ËøôÈáåÔºåÁ®ãÂ∫èÂ∞±ÂæàÂÆπÊòìË¢´ÂõûÊî∂Êéâ„ÄÇ Ê®°ÂûãÂ±Ç(Model) Êàë‰ª¨ÈíàÂØπ‰∏öÂä°Ê®°ÂûãÔºåÂª∫Á´ãÁöÑÊï∞ÊçÆÁªìÊûÑÂíåÁõ∏ÂÖ≥ÁöÑÁ±ªÔºåÂ∞±ÂèØ‰ª•ÁêÜËß£‰∏∫AndroidAppÁöÑModelÔºåModelÊòØ‰∏éViewÊó†ÂÖ≥ÔºåËÄå‰∏é‰∏öÂä°Áõ∏ÂÖ≥ÁöÑÔºàÊÑüË∞¢@XanderÁöÑËÆ≤Ëß£Ôºâ„ÄÇÂØπÊï∞ÊçÆÂ∫ìÁöÑÊìç‰Ωú„ÄÅÂØπÁΩëÁªúÁ≠âÁöÑÊìç‰ΩúÈÉΩÂ∫îËØ•Âú®ModelÈáåÈù¢Â§ÑÁêÜÔºåÂΩìÁÑ∂ÂØπ‰∏öÂä°ËÆ°ÁÆóÁ≠âÊìç‰Ωú‰πüÊòØÂøÖÈ°ªÊîæÂú®ÁöÑËØ•Â±ÇÁöÑ„ÄÇÂ∞±ÊòØÂ∫îÁî®Á®ãÂ∫è‰∏≠‰∫åËøõÂà∂ÁöÑÊï∞ÊçÆ„ÄÇ findViewById(R.id. save).setOnClickListener( this); findViewById(R.id. load).setOnClickListener( this); id = (EditText) findViewById(R.id. id); first = (EditText) findViewById(R.id. first); last = (EditText) findViewById(R.id. last); presenter = new UserPresenter( this); } @Override public void onClick(View v) { switch (v.getId()) { case R.id. save: presenter.saveUser(getID(), getFristName(), getLastName()); break; case R.id. load: presenter.loadUser(getID()); break; default: break; } } @Override public int getID() { return new Integer( id.getText().toString()); } @Override public String getFristName() { return first.getText().toString(); } @Override public String getLastName() { return last.getText().toString(); } @Override public void setFirstName(String firstName) { first.setText(firstName); } @Override public void setLastName(String lastName) { last.setText(lastName); }} entry.title: SwitchHosts!
entry.content: SwitchHosts! Ëã±Êñá ‰∏ªÈ°µÔºöhttps://oldj.github.io/SwitchHosts/ ËøôÊòØ‰∏Ä‰∏™Áî®‰∫éÂø´ÈÄüÂàáÊç¢ hosts Êñá‰ª∂ÁöÑÂ∞èÁ®ãÂ∫èÔºåÂü∫‰∫é Electron ÂºÄÂèëÔºåÂêåÊó∂‰ΩøÁî®‰∫Ü React„ÄÅAnt Design ‰ª•Âèä CodeMirror Á≠âÊ°ÜÊû∂/Â∫ì„ÄÇ Êà™Âõæ ÂäüËÉΩÁâπÊÄß Âø´ÈÄüÂàáÊç¢ hosts hosts Êñá‰ª∂ËØ≠Ê≥ïÈ´ò‰∫Æ Âú®Á∫ø hosts ÊñπÊ°à Á≥ªÁªüÊâòÁõòÂõæÊ†áÂø´ÈÄüÂàáÊç¢ macOS: ÊîØÊåÅ Alfred workflow Âø´ÈÄüÂàáÊç¢ ÂÆâË£Ö‰∏ãËΩΩÂÆâË£Ö‰Ω†ÂèØ‰ª•Áõ¥Êé•‰∏ãËΩΩÊ∫êÁ†ÅÂà∞Êú¨Âú∞ËøêË°åÊàñÁºñËæëÔºåÊàñËÄÖÂú®‰∏ãÈù¢‰∏ãËΩΩÂèØÊâßË°åÁâàÊú¨Ôºö SwitchHosts! ‰∏ãËΩΩÂú∞ÂùÄ1ÔºàGitHub releaseÔºâ SwitchHosts! ‰∏ãËΩΩÂú∞ÂùÄ2ÔºàÁôæÂ∫¶ÁΩëÁõòÔºâ brewÂú® macOS ‰∏äÔºå‰πüÂèØ‰ª•‰ΩøÁî® brew cast ÂÆâË£ÖÔºåÂëΩ‰ª§Â¶Ç‰∏ãÔºö 1brew cask install switchhosts ÊÑüË∞¢ @gobinathm„ÄÅ@iamybj Êõ¥Êñ∞ brew cask ÁâàÊú¨„ÄÇ Êñá‰ª∂Â§á‰ªΩSwitchHosts! ÁöÑÊï∞ÊçÆÊñá‰ª∂Âú® ~/.SwitchHosts ÁõÆÂΩï‰∏ãÔºàWindows Áî®Êà∑‰∏∫‰∏™‰∫∫‰∏ªÁõÆÂΩï‰∏ãÁöÑ .SwitchHosts ÁõÆÂΩï‰∏ãÔºâÔºåÂÖ∂‰∏≠ ~/.SwitchHosts/data.json ÊòØ hosts Êï∞ÊçÆÊñá‰ª∂Ôºå~/.SwitchHosts/prefereces.json ÊòØÈÖçÁΩÆ‰ø°ÊÅØ„ÄÇ ËøêË°å/ÊâìÂåÖÊñπÊ≥ïÁéØÂ¢ÉÈÖçÁΩÆ ÂÆâË£Ö Node.js ÁéØÂ¢ÉÔºõ Âú®Ê†πÁõÆÂΩï ./ ‰∏ãÔºåËøêË°å npm install ÂëΩ‰ª§ÔºåÂÆâË£ÖÂºÄÂèë‰æùËµñÂ∫ìÔºõ Âú® ./app ÁõÆÂΩï‰∏ãÔºåËøêË°å npm install ÂëΩ‰ª§ÔºåÂÆâË£Ö App ËøêË°å‰æùËµñÂ∫ìÔºõ 12npm installcd app && npm install && cd .. ÊûÑÂª∫ÂèäËøêË°å Âú® ./ ÁõÆÂΩï‰∏ãÔºåËøêË°å npm run dll ÂëΩ‰ª§ÔºåÊûÑÂª∫ÂÖ¨ÂÖ±Êñá‰ª∂Ôºà‰ªÖÈúÄÂú®Á¨¨‰∏ÄÊ¨°ÊûÑÂª∫ÊàñÂÖ¨ÂÖ±Â∫ìÂèëÁîüÊîπÂèòÊó∂ÊâßË°åÔºâÔºõ Âú® ./ ÁõÆÂΩï‰∏ãÔºåËøêË°å npm run build ÂëΩ‰ª§ÔºåÊûÑÂª∫ÊâÄÈúÄÊñá‰ª∂Ôºõ Âú® ./ ÁõÆÂΩï‰∏ãÔºåËøêË°å npm start ÂëΩ‰ª§ÔºåÂç≥ÂèØËøêË°åÁ®ãÂ∫è„ÄÇ 1234567891011# create dll filenpm run dll# buildnpm run build# startnpm start# or start in developer modenpm run dev ÊâìÂåÖÂèëÂ∏É Âª∫ËÆÆ‰ΩøÁî® electron-packager ËøõË°åÊâìÂåÖ 12# install electron-packager for use from clinpm install electron-packager -g Âú® ./ ÁõÆÂΩï‰∏ãÔºåËøêË°å npm run pack entry.title: Ë∑ëÈ©¨ÁÅØMarqueeViewÔºàÊîØÊåÅ‰ªª‰ΩïViewÔºâ
entry.content: Á±ª‰ººTextViewÁöÑandroid:ellipsize=‚Äùmarquee‚ÄùÁöÑË∑ëÈ©¨ÁÅØÊïàÊûú ‰ªªÊÑèViewÈÉΩÂèØÂÆûÁé∞ Ê∫êÁ†ÅÔºöMarqueeView 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293949596979899100101102103104105106107108109110111112113114115116117118119package com.zm.marqueeview;import android.content.Context;import android.util.AttributeSet;import android.view.LayoutInflater;import android.view.MotionEvent;import android.view.View;import android.view.WindowManager;import android.widget.HorizontalScrollView;import android.widget.LinearLayout;/** * Ë∑ëÈ©¨ÁÅØMarqueeView */public class MarqueeView extends HorizontalScrollView implements Runnable { private Context context; private LinearLayout mainLayout;//Ë∑ëÈ©¨ÁÅØÊªöÂä®ÈÉ®ÂàÜ private int scrollSpeed = 5;//ÊªöÂä®ÈÄüÂ∫¶ private int scrollDirection = LEFT_TO_RIGHT;//ÊªöÂä®ÊñπÂêë private int currentX;//ÂΩìÂâçxÂùêÊ†á private int viewMargin = 100;//ViewÈó¥Ë∑ù private int viewWidth;//ViewÊÄªÂÆΩÂ∫¶ private int screenWidth;//Â±èÂπïÂÆΩÂ∫¶ public static final int LEFT_TO_RIGHT = 1; public static final int RIGHT_TO_LEFT = 2; public MarqueeView(Context context) { this(context, null); } public MarqueeView(Context context, AttributeSet attrs) { this(context, attrs, 0); } public MarqueeView(Context context, AttributeSet attrs, int defStyle) { super(context, attrs, defStyle); this.context = context; initView(); } void initView() { WindowManager wm = (WindowManager) getContext().getSystemService(Context.WINDOW_SERVICE); screenWidth = wm.getDefaultDisplay().getWidth(); mainLayout = (LinearLayout) LayoutInflater.from(context).inflate(R.layout.scroll_content, null); this.addView(mainLayout); } public void addViewInQueue(View view) { LinearLayout.LayoutParams lp = new LinearLayout.LayoutParams(LinearLayout.LayoutParams.WRAP_CONTENT, LinearLayout.LayoutParams.WRAP_CONTENT); lp.setMargins(viewMargin, 0, 0, 0); view.setLayoutParams(lp); mainLayout.addView(view); view.measure(0, 0);//ÊµãÈáèview viewWidth = viewWidth + view.getMeasuredWidth() + viewMargin; } //ÂºÄÂßãÊªöÂä® public void startScroll() { removeCallbacks(this); currentX = (scrollDirection == LEFT_TO_RIGHT ? viewWidth : -screenWidth); post(this); } //ÂÅúÊ≠¢ÊªöÂä® public void stopScroll() { removeCallbacks(this); } //ËÆæÁΩÆViewÈó¥Ë∑ù public void setViewMargin(int viewMargin) { this.viewMargin = viewMargin; } //ËÆæÁΩÆÊªöÂä®ÈÄüÂ∫¶ public void setScrollSpeed(int scrollSpeed) { this.scrollSpeed = scrollSpeed; } //ËÆæÁΩÆÊªöÂä®ÊñπÂêë ÈªòËÆ§‰ªéÂ∑¶ÂêëÂè≥ public void setScrollDirection(int scrollDirection) { this.scrollDirection = scrollDirection; } @Override public void run() { switch (scrollDirection) { case LEFT_TO_RIGHT: mainLayout.scrollTo(currentX, 0); currentX--; if (-currentX >= screenWidth) { mainLayout.scrollTo(viewWidth, 0); currentX = viewWidth; } break; case RIGHT_TO_LEFT: mainLayout.scrollTo(currentX, 0); currentX++; if (currentX >= viewWidth) { mainLayout.scrollTo(-screenWidth, 0); currentX = -screenWidth; } break; default: break; } postDelayed(this, 50 / scrollSpeed); } @Override public boolean onTouchEvent(MotionEvent ev) { return false; }}

I/OÂ§ß‰ºö‰∏äÂèëÂ∏ÉÁöÑÂÆòÊñπapp„ÄÇÂÆÉÁöÑÊàêÂäüËÆ©ÊàëÈùûÂ∏∏ÊÑüÂÖ¥Ë∂£„ÄÇÊàëËä±‰∫Ü‰∏ÄÊï¥ÊôöÁöÑÊó∂Èó¥ÊääÁé©ÔºåÂÜ≥ÂÆöÂàÜ‰∫´‰∏Ä‰∫õËá™Â∑±ÁöÑÁªèÈ™å„ÄÇÂú®ÂºÄÂßã‰πãÂâçÊàëÊÉ≥ËØ¥Ôºå Glide Âíå Picasso Êúâ90%ÁöÑÁõ∏‰ººÂ∫¶ÔºåÂáÜÁ°ÆÁöÑËØ¥ÔºåÂ∞±ÊòØPicassoÁöÑÂÖãÈöÜÁâàÊú¨„ÄÇ‰ΩÜÊòØÂú®ÁªÜËäÇ‰∏äËøòÊòØÊúâ‰∏çÂ∞ëÂå∫Âà´ÁöÑ„ÄÇ ÂØºÂÖ•Â∫ì Glide Âíå Picasso ÈÉΩÂú®jcenter‰∏ä„ÄÇÂú®È°πÁõÆ‰∏≠Ê∑ªÂä†‰æùËµñÈùûÂ∏∏ÁÆÄÂçïÔºö Glide1234dependencies { compile 'com.github.bumptech.glide:glide:3.5.2' compile 'com.android.support:support-v4:22.0.0'} Picasso123dependencies { compile 'com.squareup.picasso:picasso:2.5.1'} ËôΩÁÑ∂‰∏§ËÄÖÁúãËµ∑Êù•‰∏ÄÊ†∑Ôºå‰ΩÜÊòØGlideÊõ¥ÊòìÁî®ÔºåÂõ†‰∏∫GlideÁöÑwithÊñπÊ≥ï‰∏çÂÖâÊé•ÂèóContextÔºåËøòÊé•ÂèóActivity Âíå FragmentÔºåContext‰ºöËá™Âä®ÁöÑ‰ªé‰ªñ‰ª¨Ëé∑Âèñ„ÄÇ ÂêåÊó∂Â∞ÜActivity/Fragment‰Ωú‰∏∫with()ÂèÇÊï∞ÁöÑÂ•ΩÂ§ÑÊòØÔºöÂõæÁâáÂä†ËΩΩ‰ºöÂíåActivity/FragmentÁöÑÁîüÂëΩÂë®Êúü‰øùÊåÅ‰∏ÄËá¥ÔºåÊØîÂ¶ÇPausedÁä∂ÊÄÅÂú®ÊöÇÂÅúÂä†ËΩΩÔºåÂú®ResumedÁöÑÊó∂ÂÄôÂèàËá™Âä®ÈáçÊñ∞Âä†ËΩΩ„ÄÇÊâÄ‰ª•ÊàëÂª∫ËÆÆ‰º†ÂèÇÁöÑÊó∂ÂÄô‰º†ÈÄíActivity Âíå FragmentÁªôGlideÔºåËÄå‰∏çÊòØContext„ÄÇ ÈªòËÆ§BitmapÊ†ºÂºèÊòØRGB_565‰∏ãÈù¢ÊòØÂä†ËΩΩÂõæÁâáÊó∂ÂíåPicassoÁöÑÊØîËæÉÔºà1920x1080 ÂÉèÁ¥†ÁöÑÂõæÁâáÂä†ËΩΩÂà∞768x432ÁöÑImageView‰∏≠Ôºâ ÂèØ‰ª•ÁúãÂà∞GlideÂä†ËΩΩÁöÑÂõæÁâáË¥®ÈáèË¶ÅÂ∑Æ‰∫éPicassoÔºàpsÔºöÊàëÁúã‰∏çÂá∫Êù•ÂìàÔºâÔºå‰∏∫‰ªÄ‰πàÔºüËøôÊòØÂõ†‰∏∫GlideÈªòËÆ§ÁöÑBitmapÊ†ºÂºèÊòØRGB_565 ÔºåÊØîARGB_8888Ê†ºÂºèÁöÑÂÜÖÂ≠òÂºÄÈîÄË¶ÅÂ∞è‰∏ÄÂçä„ÄÇ‰∏ãÈù¢ÊòØPicassoÂú®ARGB8888‰∏ã‰∏éGlideÂú®RGB565‰∏ãÁöÑÂÜÖÂ≠òÂºÄÈîÄÂõæÔºàÂ∫îÁî®Ëá™Ë∫´Âç†Áî®‰∫Ü8mÔºåÂõ†Ê≠§‰ª•8‰∏∫Âü∫ÂáÜÁ∫øÊØîËæÉÔºâÔºö Â¶ÇÊûú‰Ω†ÂØπÈªòËÆ§ÁöÑRGB_565ÊïàÊûúËøòÊØîËæÉÊª°ÊÑèÔºåÂèØ‰ª•‰∏çÂÅö‰ªª‰Ωï‰∫ãÔºå‰ΩÜÊòØÂ¶ÇÊûú‰Ω†ËßâÂæóÈöæ‰ª•Êé•ÂèóÔºåÂèØ‰ª•ÂàõÂª∫‰∏Ä‰∏™Êñ∞ÁöÑGlideModuleÂ∞ÜBitmapÊ†ºÂºèËΩ¨Êç¢Âà∞ARGB_8888Ôºö 12345678910111213public class GlideConfiguration implements GlideModule { @Override public void applyOptions(Context context, GlideBuilder builder) { // Apply options to the builder here. builder.setDecodeFormat(DecodeFormat.PREFER_ARGB_8888); } @Override public void registerComponents(Context context, Glide glide) { // register ModelLoaders here. } } ËøôÊ†∑ÁúãËµ∑Êù•Â∞±‰ºöÂ•ΩÂæàÂ§ö„ÄÇÊàë‰ª¨ÂÜçÊù•ÁúãÁúãÂÜÖÂ≠òÂºÄÈîÄÂõæÔºåËøôÊ¨°Ë≤å‰ººGlideËä±Ë¥π‰∫Ü‰∏§ÂÄç‰∫é‰∏äÊ¨°ÁöÑÂÜÖÂ≠òÔºå‰ΩÜÊòØPicassoÁöÑÂÜÖÂ≠òÂºÄÈîÄ‰ªçÁÑ∂ËøúÂ§ß‰∫éGlide„ÄÇ entry.content: ÈóÆÈ¢òÔºöÂΩìÊàë‰ª¨‰ΩøÁî®qqÂàÜ‰∫´Êó∂ÔºåÂàÜ‰∫´ÊàêÂäüÂêéÈÄâÊã©ÁïôÂú®qq,Ëøô‰∏™Êó∂ÂÄôÊåâhomeÈîÆÔºåÂõûÂà∞ÊâãÊú∫‰∏ªÁïåÈù¢ÔºåÂú®ÁÇπÂáªÂõûÂà∞ÊàëÁöÑapp,Ëøô‰∏™Êó∂ÂÄô‰ºöÂá∫Áé∞ÁïåÈù¢ÊòæÁ§∫Âá∫Êù•‰∫ÜÔºå‰ΩÜÊòØ‰ªª‰Ωï‰∫ã‰ª∂ÈÉΩ‰∏çÂìçÂ∫îÔºåÂç≥ÊåâÈíÆÊ≤°ÂèçÂ∫î„ÄÇ ÂàÜÊûêÔºöËøô‰∏™Êó∂ÂÄôÂõûÂà∞Êàë‰ª¨ÁöÑappÊó∂Ôºå‰ºöÂèëÁé∞activityÁöÑÁîüÂëΩÂë®ÊúüÂè™Ëµ∞‰∫Ü onRestart()‚ÄîonStart(),Ëµ∞Âà∞ËøôÈáåÂ∞±ÁªìÊùü‰∫ÜÔºåonResume()Âπ∂Ê≤°ÊúâÊâßË°åÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•ÁïåÈù¢‰∏çÂìçÂ∫î Ëøô‰∏™Êó∂ÂÄôÊàë‰ª¨Âèà‰ºöÂèëÁé∞qqÂàÜ‰∫´Áî®Âà∞ÁöÑÁöÑ‰∏Ä‰∏™AssistActivity ÂÆÉÁöÑÁîüÂëΩÂë®ÊúüÔºö.: ‚ÄìonActivityResult()‚ÄîonStart()‚ÄîonResume() ÁªìËÆ∫ÔºöËá≥Ê≠§ÔºåÊàë‰ª¨ÂèëÁé∞‰∫ÜÂéüÂõ†ÔºåÊòØËøô‰∏™AssistActivityÁöÑÈóÆÈ¢ò„ÄÇ Ëß£ÂÜ≥ÔºöÊàë‰ª¨ÂèØ‰ª•Âú®Êàë‰ª¨Á®ãÂ∫èÁöÑonStart()ÊñπÊ≥ïÂà§Êñ≠‰∏Ä‰∏ãÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûúËøô‰∏™AssistActivityÂ§ÑÂú®Ê†àÈ°∂Â∞±ÊääÂÆÉÊ∏ÖÈô§Êéâ„ÄÇ 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627@Overrideprotected void onStart() { super.onStart(); Log.i("---share----", "-----start"); if(isNeedRestart()){ Intent intent = new Intent(context, this.getClass()); intent.addFlags(Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_CLEAR_TOP); //Ê∏ÖÈô§Ê†àÈ°∂ÁöÑactivity intent.addFlags(Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_NO_ANIMATION);//‰∏çÊòæÁ§∫Â§ö‰ΩôÁöÑÂä®ÁîªÔºåÂÅáË£ÖÊ≤°ÊúâÈáçÊñ∞ÂêØÂä® //ËÆ∞ÂæóÂ∏¶ÈúÄË¶ÅÁöÑÂèÇÊï∞ startActivity(intent); }}private boolean isNeedRestart(){ ActivityManager am = (ActivityManager) context.getSystemService(Context.ACTIVITY_SERVICE); List<ActivityManager.RunningTaskInfo> tasks = am.getRunningTasks(1); if (!tasks.isEmpty()) { ComponentName topActivity = tasks.get(0).topActivity; ActivityManager.RunningTaskInfo taskInfo = tasks.get(0); if (topActivity.getPackageName().equals(context.getPackageName())) { // Ëã•ÂΩìÂâçÊ†àÈ°∂ÁïåÈù¢ÊòØAssistActivityÔºåÂàôÈúÄË¶ÅÊâãÂä®ÂÖ≥Èó≠ if (topActivity.getClassName().equals("com.tencent.connect.common.AssistActivity")) return true; } } return false;}

color)//ËÆæÁΩÆÂúÜÁéØÁöÑÂàªÂ∫¶Â§ßÂ∞è (ÈªòËÆ§ÂÄº: 2.5dp)setArcCalibrationSize(int dpSize) Style 3 1234567891011121314151617181920212223//ËÆæÁΩÆÂúÜÁéØ‰πãÈó¥ÁöÑË∑ùÁ¶ª (ÈªòËÆ§ÂÄº: 10dp)setArcSpacing(float dpSize)//ËÆæÁΩÆÂ§ñÁéØÁöÑÁîªÁ¨îÂ±ûÊÄß (ÈªòËÆ§ÂÄº: 1.5dp Color.argb(80, 255, 255, 255))setOuterArcPaint(float dpSize, @ColorInt int color)//ËÆæÁΩÆÂ§ñÁéØÁöÑËøõÂ∫¶È¢úËâ≤ (ÈªòËÆ§ÂÄº: Color.argb(200, 255, 255, 255))setProgressOuterArcColor(@ColorInt int color)//ËÆæÁΩÆÂÜÖÁéØÁöÑÁîªÁ¨îÂ±ûÊÄß (ÈªòËÆ§ÂÄº: 1.5dp Color.argb(50, 255, 255, 255))setInnerArcPaint(float dpSize, @ColorInt int color)//ËÆæÁΩÆÂÜÖÁéØÁöÑËøõÂ∫¶È¢úËâ≤ (ÈªòËÆ§ÂÄº: Color.argb(170, 255, 255, 255))setProgressInnerArcPaint(@ColorInt int color)//ËÆæÁΩÆÂÜÖÁéØÂÆûÁ∫øÂíåËôöÁ∫øÁä∂ÊÄÅ (ÈªòËÆ§ÂÄº: float[] { 10, 10 })setInnerArcPathEffect(float[] intervals)//ËÆæÁΩÆËøõÂ∫¶ÁÇπÁöÑÁîªÁ¨îÂ±ûÊÄß (ÈªòËÆ§ÂÄº: 3dp white)setProgressPointPaint(float dpRadiusSize,@ColorInt int color)//ËÆæÁΩÆÊåáÁ§∫Âô®È¢úËâ≤ (ÈªòËÆ§ÂÄº: entry.title: Android‰∏≠Â§öÁ∫øÁ®ãÂàáÊç¢ÁöÑÂá†ÁßçÊñπÊ≥ï
entry.content: Êàë‰ª¨Áü•ÈÅìÔºåÂ§öÁ∫øÁ®ãÊòØAndroidÂºÄÂèë‰∏≠ÂøÖÁé∞ÁöÑÂú∫ÊôØÔºåÂæàÂ§öÂéüÁîüAPIÂíåÂºÄÊ∫êÈ°πÁõÆÈÉΩÊúâÂ§öÁ∫øÁ®ãÁöÑÂÜÖÂÆπÔºåËøôÈáåÁÆÄÂçïÊÄªÁªìÂíåÊé¢ËÆ®‰∏Ä‰∏ãÂ∏∏ËßÅÁöÑÂ§öÁ∫øÁ®ãÂàáÊç¢ÊñπÂºè„ÄÇÊàë‰ª¨ÂÖàÂõûÈ°æ‰∏Ä‰∏ãJavaÂ§öÁ∫øÁ®ãÁöÑÂá†‰∏™Âü∫Á°ÄÂÜÖÂÆπÔºåÁÑ∂ÂêéÂÜçÂàÜÊûêÊÄªÁªì‰∏Ä‰∫õÁªèÂÖ∏‰ª£Á†Å‰∏≠ÂØπ‰∫éÁ∫øÁ®ãÂàáÊç¢ÁöÑÂÆûÁé∞ÊñπÂºè„ÄÇ Âá†ÁÇπÂü∫Á°ÄÂ§öÁ∫øÁ®ãÂàáÊç¢ÔºåÂ§ßÊ¶ÇÂèØ‰ª•ÂàáÂàÜ‰∏∫ËøôÊ†∑Âá†‰∏™ÂÜÖÂÆπÔºöÂ¶Ç‰ΩïÂºÄÂêØÂ§ö‰∏™Á∫øÁ®ãÔºåÂ¶Ç‰ΩïÂÆö‰πâÊØè‰∏™Á∫øÁ®ãÁöÑ‰ªªÂä°ÔºåÂ¶Ç‰ΩïÂú®Á∫øÁ®ã‰πãÈó¥‰∫íÁõ∏ÈÄö‰ø°„ÄÇ ThreadThreadÂèØ‰ª•Ëß£ÂÜ≥ÂºÄÂêØÂ§ö‰∏™Á∫øÁ®ãÁöÑÈóÆÈ¢ò„ÄÇThreadÊòØJava‰∏≠ÂÆûÁé∞Â§öÁ∫øÁ®ãÁöÑÁ∫øÁ®ãÁ±ªÔºåÊØè‰∏™ThreadÂØπË±°ÈÉΩÂèØ‰ª•ÂêØÂä®‰∏Ä‰∏™Êñ∞ÁöÑÁ∫øÁ®ãÔºåÊ≥®ÊÑèÊòØÂèØ‰ª•ÂêØÂä®Ôºå‰πüÂèØ‰ª•‰∏çÂêØÂä®Êñ∞Á∫øÁ®ãÔºö 12thread.run();//‰∏çÂêØÂä®Êñ∞Á∫øÁ®ãÔºåÂú®ÂΩìÂâçÁ∫øÁ®ãÊâßË°åthread.start();//ÂêØÂä®Êñ∞Á∫øÁ®ã„ÄÇ Âè¶Â§ñÂ∞±ÊòØThreadÂ≠òÂú®Á∫øÁ®ã‰ºòÂÖàÁ∫ßÈóÆÈ¢òÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûú‰∏∫ThreadËÆæÁΩÆËæÉÈ´òÁöÑÁ∫øÁ®ã‰ºòÂÖàÁ∫ßÔºåÂ∞±ÊúâÊú∫‰ºöËé∑ÂæóÊõ¥Â§öÁöÑCPUËµÑÊ∫êÔºåÊ≥®ÊÑèËøôÈáå‰πüÊòØÊúâÊú∫‰ºöÔºå‰ºòÂÖàÁ∫ßÈ´òÁöÑThread‰∏çÊòØÂøÖÁÑ∂‰ºöÂÖà‰∫éÂÖ∂‰ªñThreadÊâßË°åÔºåÂè™ÊòØÁ≥ªÁªü‰ºöÂÄæÂêë‰∫éÁªôÂÆÉÂàÜÈÖçÊõ¥Â§öÁöÑCPU„ÄÇÈªòËÆ§ÊÉÖÂÜµ‰∏ãÔºåÊñ∞Âª∫ÁöÑThreadÂíåÂΩìÂâçThreadÁöÑÁ∫øÁ®ã‰ºòÂÖàÁ∫ß‰∏ÄËá¥„ÄÇËÆæÁΩÆÁ∫øÁ®ã‰ºòÂÖàÁ∫ßÊúâ‰∏§ÁßçÊñπÂºèÔºö 12thread.setPriority(Thread.MAX_PRIORITY);//1~10ÔºåÈÄöËøáÁ∫øÁ®ãËÆæÁΩÆProcess.setThreadPriority(Process.THREAD_PRIORITY_BACKGROUND);//-20~19ÔºåÈÄöËøáËøõÁ®ãËÆæÁΩÆ Ëøô‰∏§ÁßçËÆæÁΩÆÊñπÂºèÊòØÁõ∏ÂØπÁã¨Á´ãÁöÑÔºåÂú®Android‰∏≠Ôºå‰∏ÄËà¨Âª∫ËÆÆÈÄöËøáProcessËøõÁ®ãËÆæÁΩÆ‰ºòÂÖàÁ∫ß„ÄÇ ThreadPoolThreadÊú¨Ë∫´ÊòØÈúÄË¶ÅÂç†Áî®ÂÜÖÂ≠òÁöÑÔºåÂºÄÂêØ/ÈîÄÊØÅËøáÈáèÁöÑÂ∑•‰ΩúÁ∫øÁ®ã‰ºöÈÄ†ÊàêËøáÈáèÁöÑËµÑÊ∫êÊçüËÄóÔºåËøôÁßçÂú∫ÊôØÊàë‰ª¨‰∏ÄËà¨‰ºöÈÄöËøáÂØπËµÑÊ∫êÁöÑÂ§çÁî®Êù•ËøõË°å‰ºòÂåñÔºåÈíàÂØπIOËµÑÊ∫êÊàë‰ª¨‰ºöÂÅöIOÂ§çÁî®Ôºà‰æãÂ¶ÇHttpÁöÑKeepAliveÔºâÔºåÈíàÂØπÂÜÖÂ≠òÊàë‰ª¨‰ºöÂÅöÂÜÖÂ≠òÊ±†Â§çÁî®Ôºà‰æãÂ¶ÇFrescoÁöÑÂÜÖÂ≠òÊ±†ÔºâÔºåÈíàÂØπCPUËµÑÊ∫êÔºåÊàë‰ª¨‰∏ÄËà¨‰ºöÂÅöÁ∫øÁ®ãÂ§çÁî®Ôºå‰πüÂ∞±ÊòØÁ∫øÁ®ãÊ±†„ÄÇÊâÄ‰ª•ÔºåÂú®AndroidÂºÄÂèë‰∏≠Ôºå‰∏ÄËà¨‰∏ç‰ºöÁõ¥Êé•ÂºÄÂêØÂ§ßÈáèÁöÑThreadÔºåËÄåÊòØ‰ºö‰ΩøÁî®ThreadPoolÊù•Â§çÁî®Á∫øÁ®ã„ÄÇ RunnableRunnable‰∏ªË¶ÅËß£ÂÜ≥Â¶Ç‰ΩïÂÆö‰πâÊØè‰∏™Á∫øÁ®ãÁöÑÂ∑•‰Ωú‰ªªÂä°ÁöÑÈóÆÈ¢ò„ÄÇRunnableÊòØJava‰∏≠ÂÆûÁé∞Â§öÁ∫øÁ®ãÁöÑÊé•Âè£ÔºåÁõ∏ÂØπThreadËÄåË®ÄÔºåRunnableÊé•Âè£Êõ¥ÂÆπÊòìÊâ©Â±ïÔºà‰∏çÈúÄË¶ÅÂçïÁªßÊâøÔºâÔºåËÄå‰∏îÔºåThreadÊú¨Ë∫´‰πüÊòØ‰∏ÄÁßçRunnableÔºö 1public class Thread implements Runnable { Áõ∏ÊØîThreadËÄåË®ÄÔºåRunnable‰∏çÂÖ≥Ê≥®Â¶Ç‰ΩïË∞ÉÂ∫¶Á∫øÁ®ãÔºåÂè™ÂÖ≥ÂøÉÂ¶Ç‰ΩïÂÆö‰πâË¶ÅÊâßË°åÁöÑÂ∑•‰Ωú‰ªªÂä°ÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•Âú®ÂÆûÈôÖÂºÄÂèë‰∏≠ÔºåÂ§ö‰ΩøÁî®RunnableÊé•Âè£ÂÆåÊàêÂ§öÁ∫øÁ®ãÂºÄÂèë„ÄÇ CallableCallableÂíåRunnableÂü∫Êú¨Á±ª‰ººÔºå‰ΩÜÊòØCallableÂèØ‰ª•ËøîÂõûÊâßË°åÁªìÊûú„ÄÇ Á∫øÁ®ãÈó¥ÈÄö‰ø°ThreadÂíåRunnableËÉΩÂÆûÁé∞ÂàáÊç¢Âà∞Âè¶‰∏Ä‰∏™Á∫øÁ®ãÂ∑•‰ΩúÔºàRunnableÈúÄË¶ÅÈ¢ùÂ§ñÊåáÊ¥æÂ∑•‰ΩúÁ∫øÁ®ãÔºâÔºå‰ΩÜÂÆÉ‰ª¨ÂÆåÊàê‰ªªÂä°ÂêéÂ∞±‰ºöÈÄÄÂá∫ÔºåÂπ∂‰∏çÊ≥®ÈáçÂ¶Ç‰ΩïÂú®Á∫øÁ®ãÈó¥ÂÆûÁé∞ÈÄö‰ø°ÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•ÂàáÊç¢Á∫øÁ®ãÊó∂ÔºåËøòÈúÄË¶ÅÂú®Á∫øÁ®ãÈó¥ÈÄö‰ø°ÔºåËøôÂ∞±ÈúÄË¶Å‰∏Ä‰∫õÁ∫øÁ®ãÈó¥ÈÄö‰ø°Êú∫Âà∂„ÄÇ Future‰∏ÄËà¨Êù•ËØ¥ÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûúË¶ÅÂÅöÁÆÄÂçïÁöÑÈÄö‰ø°ÔºåÊàë‰ª¨ÊúÄÂ∏∏Áî®ÁöÑÊòØÈÄöËøáÊé•Âè£ÂõûË∞ÉÊù•ÂÆûÁé∞„ÄÇFutureÂ∞±ÊòØËøôÊ†∑‰∏ÄÁßçÊé•Âè£ÔºåÂÆÉÂèØ‰ª•ÈÉ®ÂàÜÂú∞Ëß£ÂÜ≥Á∫øÁ®ãÈÄö‰ø°ÁöÑÈóÆÈ¢òÔºåFutureÊé•Âè£ÂÆö‰πâ‰∫Üdone„ÄÅcanceledÁ≠âÂõûË∞ÉÂáΩÊï∞ÔºåÂΩìÂ∑•‰ΩúÁ∫øÁ®ãÁöÑ‰ªªÂä°ÂÆåÊàêÊó∂ÔºåÂÆÉ‰ºöÔºàÂú®Â∑•‰ΩúÁ∫øÁ®ã‰∏≠ÔºâÈÄöËøáÂõûË∞ÉÂëäÁü•Êàë‰ª¨ÔºåÊàë‰ª¨ÂÜçÈááÁî®ÂÖ∂‰ªñÊâãÊÆµÈÄöÁü•ÂÖ∂‰ªñÁ∫øÁ®ã„ÄÇ 123456mFuture = new FutureTask<MyBizClass>(runnable) { @Override protected void done() { ...//ËøòÊòØÂú®Â∑•‰ΩúÁ∫øÁ®ãÈáå }}; ConditionConditionÂÖ∂ÂÆûÊòØÂíåLock‰∏ÄËµ∑‰ΩøÁî®ÁöÑÔºå‰ΩÜÂ¶ÇÊûúÊääÂÆÉËßÜ‰∏∫‰∏ÄÁßçÁ∫øÁ®ãÈó¥ÈÄö‰ø°ÁöÑÂ∑•ÂÖ∑Ôºå‰πüËØ¥ÁöÑÈÄö„ÄÇÂõ†‰∏∫ÔºåConditionÊú¨Ë∫´ÂÆö‰ΩçÂ∞±ÊòØ‰∏ÄÁßçÂ§öÁ∫øÁ®ãÈó¥ÂçèË∞ÉÈÄö‰ø°ÁöÑÂ∑•ÂÖ∑ÔºåConditionÂèØ‰ª•Âú®Êüê‰∫õÊù°‰ª∂‰∏ãÔºåÂî§ÈÜíÁ≠âÂæÖÁ∫øÁ®ã„ÄÇ 1234567 Lock lock = new ReentrantLock(); Condition notFull = lock.newCondition(); //ÂÆö‰πâLockÁöÑCondition... while (count == items.length) notFull.await();//Á≠âÂæÖconditionÁöÑÁä∂ÊÄÅ... notFull.signal();//ËææÂà∞conditionÁöÑÁä∂ÊÄÅ HandlerÂÖ∂ÂÆûÔºåÊúÄÂÆåÊï¥ÁöÑÁ∫øÁ®ãÈó¥ÈÄö‰ø°Êú∫Âà∂Ôºå‰πüÊòØÊàë‰ª¨ÊúÄÁÜüÊÇâÁöÑÁ∫øÁ®ãÈó¥ÈÄö‰ø°Êú∫Âà∂ÔºåËé´Ëøá‰∫éHandlerÈÄö‰ø°Êú∫Âà∂ÔºåHandlerÂà©Áî®Á∫øÁ®ãÂ∞ÅÈó≠ÁöÑThreadLocalÁª¥ÊåÅ‰∏Ä‰∏™Ê∂àÊÅØÈòüÂàóÔºåHandlerÁöÑÊ†∏ÂøÉÊòØÈÄöËøáËøô‰∏™Ê∂àÊÅØÈòüÂàóÊù•‰º†ÈÄíMessageÔºå‰ªéËÄåÂÆûÁé∞Á∫øÁ®ãÈó¥ÈÄö‰ø°„ÄÇ AsyncTaskÁöÑÂ§öÁ∫øÁ®ãÂàáÊç¢ÂõûÈ°æÂÆåÂ§öÁ∫øÁ®ãÁöÑÂá†‰∏™Âü∫Á°ÄÊ¶ÇÂøµÔºåÂÖàÊù•ÁúãÁúãÁÆÄÂçïÁöÑÂ§öÁ∫øÁ®ãÂàáÊç¢ÔºåAndroidËá™Â∏¶ÁöÑAsyncTask„ÄÇAsyncTask‰∏ªË¶ÅÂú®doInBackgroundÂáΩÊï∞‰∏≠ÂÆö‰πâÂ∑•‰ΩúÁ∫øÁ®ãÁöÑÂ∑•‰ΩúÂÜÖÂÆπÔºåÂú®ÂÖ∂‰ªñÂáΩÊï∞‰∏≠ÂÆö‰πâ‰∏ªÁ∫øÁ®ãÁöÑÂ∑•‰ΩúÂÜÖÂÆπÔºå‰æãÂ¶ÇonPostExecuteÔºåËøôÈáåÈù¢ÂøÖÁÑ∂Ê∂âÂèä‰∏§‰∏™ÈóÆÈ¢òÔºö1.Â¶Ç‰ΩïÂÆûÁé∞ÊäädoInBackgroundÊäõÁªôÂ∑•‰ΩúÁ∫øÁ®ã2.Â¶Ç‰ΩïÂÆûÁé∞ÊääonPostExecuteÊäõÁªô‰∏ªÁ∫øÁ®ãÂÖ∂ÂÆûÈùûÂ∏∏ÁÆÄÂçïÔºåÊàë‰ª¨ÂÖàÁúãÁ¨¨‰∏Ä‰∏™ 1.Â¶Ç‰ΩïÂÆûÁé∞ÊäädoInBackgroundÊäõÁªôÂ∑•‰ΩúÁ∫øÁ®ãÂú®‰ΩøÁî®AsyncTaskÊó∂ÔºåÊàë‰ª¨‰∏ÄËà¨‰ºöÂàõÂª∫‰∏Ä‰∏™Âü∫‰∫éAsyncTaskÁöÑÊâ©Â±ïÁ±ªÊàñÂåøÂêçÁ±ªÔºåÂú®ÂÖ∂‰∏≠ÂÆûÁé∞Âá†‰∏™ÊäΩË±°ÂáΩÊï∞Ôºå‰æãÂ¶ÇÔºö 1234567891011private class MyTask extends AsyncTask<String, Object, Long> { @Override protected void onPreExecute() {... } @Override protected Long doInBackground(String... params) {... } @Override protected void onProgressUpdate(Object... values) {... } @Override protected void onPostExecute(Long aLong) {... } @Override protected void onCancelled() {... } ÁÑ∂ÂêéÔºåÊàë‰ª¨‰ºöÂÆû‰æãÂåñËøô‰∏™AsyncTaskÔºö 1MyTask mTask = new MyTask(); Âú®AsyncTaskÊ∫êÁ†Å‰∏≠ÔºåÊàë‰ª¨ÁúãÂà∞ÔºåÊûÑÈÄ†ÂáΩÊï∞Èáå‰ºöÂàõÂª∫‰∏Ä‰∏™WorkerRunnableÔºö 123456public AsyncTask() { mWorker = new WorkerRunnable<Params, Result>() {//ËøôÊòØ‰∏Ä‰∏™Callable public Result call() throws Exception { ... result = doInBackground(mParams);//Âú®Â∑•‰ΩúÁ∫øÁ®ã‰∏≠ÊâßË°å ... WorkerRunnableÂÆûÈôÖ‰∏äÊòØ‰∏Ä‰∏™CallableÂØπË±°ÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•ÔºådoInBackgroundÊòØË¢´ÂåÖÂú®‰∏Ä‰∏™CallableÂØπË±°‰∏≠‰∫ÜÔºåËøô‰∏™CallableËøò‰ºöË¢´ÁªßÁª≠ÂåÖË£ÖÔºåÊúÄÁªàË¢´‰∫§Áªô‰∏Ä‰∏™Á∫øÁ®ãÊ±†ÂéªÊâßË°åÔºö 12345Runnable mActive;...if ((mActive = mTasks.poll()) != null) { THREAD_POOL_EXECUTOR.execute(mActive);//‰∫§ÁªôÁ∫øÁ®ãÊ±†ÊâßË°å} Ê¢≥ÁêÜ‰∏Ä‰∏ãÔºåÂ§ßËá¥ËøáÁ®ã‰∏∫ÔºöÂÆö‰πâdoInBackground‚Äì>Ë¢´‰∏Ä‰∏™CallableË∞ÉÁî®‚Äì>Â±ÇÂ±ÇÂåÖ‰∏∫‰∏Ä‰∏™Runnable‚Äì>‰∫§ÁªôÁ∫øÁ®ãÊ±†ÊâßË°å„ÄÇËøôÊ†∑Â∞±Ëß£ÂÜ≥‰∫ÜÁ¨¨‰∏Ä‰∏™ÈóÆÈ¢òÔºåÂ¶Ç‰ΩïÂÆûÁé∞ÊäädoInBackgroundÊäõÁªôÂ∑•‰ΩúÁ∫øÁ®ã„ÄÇÊàë‰ª¨ÂÜçÊù•ÁúãÁ¨¨‰∫å‰∏™ÈóÆÈ¢ò„ÄÇ 2.Â¶Ç‰ΩïÂÆûÁé∞ÊääonPostExecuteÊäõÁªô‰∏ªÁ∫øÁ®ãÈ¶ñÂÖàÔºåÊàë‰ª¨Ë¶ÅÁü•ÈÅìÂ∑•‰Ωú‰ªªÂä°‰ΩïÊó∂ÊâßË°åÂÆåÊØïÔºåÂ∞±ÈúÄË¶ÅÂú®Â∑•‰ΩúÂÆåÊàêÊó∂Ëß¶Âèë‰∏Ä‰∏™Êé•Âè£ÂõûË∞ÉÔºå‰πüÂ∞±ÊòØÂâçÈù¢ËØ¥ËøáÁöÑFutureÔºåËøòÊòØÁúãAsyncTaskÊ∫êÁ†ÅÔºö 123456789101112131415public AsyncTask() { mWorker = new WorkerRunnable<Params, Result>() { public Result call() throws Exception { ... }; mFuture = new FutureTask<Result>(mWorker) { @Override protected void done() {//FutureÁöÑÂõûË∞É try { postResultIfNotInvoked(get());//get()ÊòØFutureTaskÊé•Âè£ÂáΩÊï∞ ... } }; } ËøôÊ†∑ÔºåÊàë‰ª¨Â∞±Áü•ÈÅìÂèØ‰ª•Â§ÑÁêÜonPostExecuteÂáΩÊï∞‰∫ÜÔºå‰ΩÜÊòØÔºåÊàë‰ª¨ËøòÈúÄË¶ÅÊääÂÆÉÊäõÁªô‰∏ªÁ∫øÁ®ãÔºå‰∏ªË¶ÅÊ∫êÁ†ÅÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÔºö 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132//mWorker„ÄÅmFutureÂíåÈÉΩ‰ºöÊåáÂêëpostResultÂáΩÊï∞private Result postResult(Result result) { @SuppressWarnings("unchecked") Message message = getHandler().obtainMessage(MESSAGE_POST_RESULT, new AsyncTaskResult<Result>(this, result)); message.sendToTarget(); return result;}//getHandler()‰ºöÊåáÂêëInternalHandlerprivate static class InternalHandler extends Handler { public InternalHandler() { super(Looper.getMainLooper());//ÊåáÂêëMainLooper } @SuppressWarnings({"unchecked", "RawUseOfParameterizedType"}) @Override public void handleMessage(Message msg) { AsyncTaskResult<?> result = (AsyncTaskResult<?>) msg.obj; com.taobao.weex.WXSDKManager;import com.taobao.weex.adapter.IWXImgLoaderAdapter;import com.taobao.weex.common.WXImageStrategy;import com.taobao.weex.dom.WXImageQuality;public class ImageAdapter implements IWXImgLoaderAdapter { @Override public void setImage(final String url, final ImageView view, WXImageQuality quality, WXImageStrategy strategy) { //ÂÆûÁé∞Ëá™Â∑±ÁöÑÂõæÁâá‰∏ãËΩΩ„ÄÇ WXSDKManager.getInstance().postOnUiThread(new Runnable() { @Override public void run() { if (view == null || view.getLayoutParams() == null) { return; } if (TextUtils.isEmpty(url)) { view.setImageBitmap(null); return; } String temp = url; if (url.startsWith("//")) { temp = "http:" + url; } if (view.getLayoutParams().width <= 0 || view.getLayoutParams().height <= 0) { return; } if (view != null && view.getContext() != null) { try { Glide.with(view.getContext()).load(temp).into(view); } catch (Exception e) { e.printStackTrace(); } } } }, 0); }}
